RUS_setup_senate_duma_conflict_variables = {
	set_temp_variable = { bop_value = mp_support }
	divide_temp_variable = { bop_value = 550 }
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = {
				var = bop_value
				value = 0.5
				compare = greater_than_or_equals
			}
			divide_temp_variable = { bop_value = -2 }
		}
	}
	else = {
		multiply_temp_variable = { bop_value = 2 }
	}
		
	set_power_balance = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		left_side = RUS_duma_side # will keep the last set side if not specified
		right_side = RUS_senate_side # will keep the last set side if not specified
		#set_default = yes # whether or not to reset the power balance to the initial value, default = no
		set_value = var:bop_value # if specified will set the value of the power balance, this option will override the effect of set_default so the two options should not be used together. if neither set_default or set_value is specified the current value of the power balance will not change
	}	
}
RUS_bop_low_increase_effect_10 = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = 0.10
	}
}
RUS_bop_low_increase_effect_12 = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = 0.12
	}
}
RUS_bop_low_increase_effect_13 = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = 0.13
	}
}
RUS_bop_medium_increase_effect = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = 0.15
	}
}
RUS_bop_large_increase_effect = {	
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = 0.20
	}
}
RUS_bop_very_large_increase_effect = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = 0.25
	}
}
RUS_bop_low_decrease_effect_10 = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.10
	}
}
RUS_bop_low_decrease_effect_12 = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.12
	}
}
RUS_bop_low_decrease_effect_13 = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.13
	}
}
RUS_bop_medium_decrease_effect = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.15
	}
}
RUS_bop_large_decrease_effect = {	
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.20
	}
}
RUS_bop_very_large_decrease_effect = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.25
	}
}
RUS_bop_enormous_decrease_effect = {
	add_power_balance_value = {
		id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		value = -0.75
	}
}

	# add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status= <d> }	# 0 for Inactive, 1 for Governing, 2 for Supporting Government, 3 for Opposition, 4 for Sit-out
	# add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats= <d> }	# number of seats in Duma
	# add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats= <d> }	# number of seats in Senate
	# add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats= <d> }	# number of seats in Senate, appointed by president
	# add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats= <d> }	# number of seats in Senate, elected by regions
	# add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats= <d> }	# number of seats in Senate, elected by population

	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# Hummet #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 39	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# Musavat #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 40	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# ERK #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 41	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# Alash #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 42	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 2		}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# Ittihod #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 43	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# YTP #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 44	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 0		}	
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	# Baltic Socialist #
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Identity	= 45	}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Status		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Duma_Party_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats				= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats		= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats			= 0		}
	add_to_array = { Senate_Party_General_Seats				= 0		}
	
	RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
	RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
}

	
RUS_calculate_government_variables = {
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_var = 550 }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_pp_var = 550 }
	subtract_from_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_var = mp_support }
	subtract_from_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_pp_var = mp_support }
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_seats_var > 275 }
		}
		divide_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_var = -5500 }	
	}
	else = {
		divide_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_var = 5500 }	
	}
	set_variable = { RUS_duma_maj_min_gov_stability_factor = RUS_seats_var }
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_seats_pp_var > 275 }
		}
		divide_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_pp_var = -2750 }	
	}
	else = {
		divide_temp_variable = { RUS_seats_pp_var = 2750 }	
	}
	set_variable = { RUS_duma_maj_min_gov_political_power_gain = RUS_seats_pp_var }
}
RUS_add_to_coalition = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = syndicalist_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist } 
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 } # PLSR  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist } 
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 1 } # NSP  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = psr_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 1 } # PSR  (Governing)		
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { political_power_ideology = coalition_partner_var }
					is_in_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = add_to_coalition
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_in_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
					has_government = var:coalition_partner_var
					check_variable = { political_power_ideology = coalition_partner_var }
				}
			}
			add_to_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
					}
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned } 
				}
				set_temp_variable = { psr_pp_gain = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { psr_pp_gain = 2 }
				add_to_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = psr_pp_gain }
			}
			else = {
				add_to_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 1 } # RSDRP  (Governing)		
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { political_power_ideology = coalition_partner_var }
					is_in_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = add_to_coalition
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_in_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
					has_government = var:coalition_partner_var
					check_variable = { political_power_ideology = coalition_partner_var }
				}
			}
			add_to_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
					}
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned } 
				}
				set_temp_variable = { rsdrp_pp_gain = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { rsdrp_pp_gain = 2 }
				add_to_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = rsdrp_pp_gain }
			}
			else = {
				add_to_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 1 } # LKDP  (Governing)		
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 1 } # RKDP  (Governing)		
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = social_conservative_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^8 = 1 } # VNS  (Governing)		
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^9 = 1 } # EP  (Governing)		
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = national_populist_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist } 
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 1 } # NRPR  (Governing)		
		}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = solidarist_coalition }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^11 = 1 } # NSNP  (Governing)		
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}	
}
RUS_remove_from_coalition = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = syndicalist_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = syndicalist_coalition
		clr_country_flag = syndicalist_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist } 
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 3 } # PLSR  (Opposition)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
		clr_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist } 
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = psr_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = psr_coalition
		clr_country_flag = psr_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 3 }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat } 
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = remove_from_coalition
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
					check_variable = { coalition_partners^num = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition }
					set_temp_variable = { psr_pp_remove = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
					divide_temp_variable = { psr_pp_remove = 2 }
					subtract_from_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = psr_pp_remove }
				}
				else = {
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
					clear_variable = coalition_pp_gain
					clear_array = coalition_partners
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition }
					set_temp_variable = { psr_pp_remove = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
					divide_temp_variable = { psr_pp_remove = 2 }
					subtract_from_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = psr_pp_remove }
				}
				else = {
					remove_from_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
					subtract_from_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition_to_remove }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 3 }
		clr_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition
		clr_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition_to_remove
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = remove_from_coalition
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
					check_variable = { coalition_partners^num = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = psr_coalition }
					set_temp_variable = { rsdrp_pp_remove = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
					divide_temp_variable = { rsdrp_pp_remove = 2 }
					subtract_from_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = rsdrp_pp_remove }
				}
				else = {
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = party_popularity_dynamic_modifier_coalition }
					clear_variable = coalition_pp_gain
					clear_array = coalition_partners
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = psr_coalition }
					set_temp_variable = { rsdrp_pp_remove = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
					divide_temp_variable = { rsdrp_pp_remove = 2 }
					subtract_from_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = rsdrp_pp_remove }
				}
				else = {
					remove_from_array = { coalition_partners = coalition_partner_var }
					subtract_from_variable = { coalition_pp_gain = party_popularity@var:coalition_partner_var }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		clr_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 3 }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal } 
		remove_from_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
		clr_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 3 }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal } 
		remove_from_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = social_conservative_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = social_conservative_coalition
		clr_country_flag = social_conservative_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^8 = 3 }
		remove_from_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition_to_remove }
		clr_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
		clr_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition_to_remove
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat } 
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^9 = 3 }
		remove_from_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = national_populist_coalition_to_remove }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist } 
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 3 }
		}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = solidarist_coalition_to_remove }
		set_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist } 
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^11 = 3 }
	}	
}
RUS_plsr_support_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { plsr_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 2 } # PLSR  (Supports Gov)		
	}	
}
RUS_nsp_support_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { nsp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 2 } # NSP  (Supports Gov)		
	}	
}
RUS_psr_support_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { psr_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 2 } # PSR (Supports Gov )
	}		
}
RUS_rsdrp_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { rsdrp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 2 } 
	}
}
RUS_lkdp_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { lkdp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 2 }
	}
}
RUS_pp_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { pp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^6 = 2 } 	
	}
}
RUS_rkdp_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { rkdp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 2 }	
	}
}
RUS_vns_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { vns_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^8 = 2 }	
	}
}
RUS_ep_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { ep_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^9 = 2 }	
	}
}
RUS_rms_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { nsnp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^10 = 2 }
	}	
}
RUS_nsnp_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { nsnp_in_power = no }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^11 = 2 }
	}
}
RUS_nrpr_supports_gov = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo } }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 2 }
	}
}
RUS_organisation_supports_gov = {
	# Requires temp var with party id
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^party_id = 2 }
}
RUS_organisation_opposition = {
	# Requires temp var with party id
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^party_id = 3 }
}
RUS_organisation_sitout = {
	# Requires temp var with party id
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^party_id = 4 }
}

RUS_clear_all_coalitions = {
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Status
		value = status
		index = i

		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { status = 1 } } # Coalition
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 4 }
		}
	}
	mp_support_calc = yes
	end_coalition = yes
}
RUS_setup_initial_rus_duma_senate = {
	set_variable = { var = mp_support value = 282 }
	set_variable = { var = mp_total value = 550 }
	set_variable = { var = senate_total value = 150 }
	set_variable = { var = senate_support value = 121 }
	set_variable = { var = rsdrp_mp value = 0 }
	set_variable = { var = bund_mp value = 0 }
	set_variable = { var = vtssps_mp value = 0 }
	set_variable = { var = psr_mp value = 132 }
	set_variable = { var = vks_mp value = 34 }
	set_variable = { var = lkdp_mp value = 101 }
	set_variable = { var = pp_mp value = 0 }
	set_variable = { var = rkdp_mp value = 0 }
	set_variable = { var = vns_mp value = 6 }
	set_variable = { var = independent_mp value = 2 }
	set_variable = { var = oblastniki_mp value = 10 }
	set_variable = { var = autonomists_mp value = 7 }
	set_variable = { var = federalists_mp value = 3 }

	set_variable = { var = senators_election_total value = 50 }
	set_variable = { var = senators_election_regional_total value = 50 }

	set_variable = { var = RUS_president_impeach value = 2 }

	set_variable = { var = RUS_parliament_barrier value = 0.03 }
		
	set_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 50 }
	set_variable = { senators_election_total = 50 }
	
	final_senators_recalc = yes
	calculate_half_senate = yes
	calculate_two_thirds_senate = yes
	calculate_half_duma = yes
	calculate_two_thirds_duma = yes
	RUS_calculate_government_variables = yes
	RUS_setup_duma_arrays = yes
	add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_duma_maj_min_gov }
}
calculate_half_senate = {
	set_variable = { half_senate_plus_one = senate_total }
	divide_variable = { half_senate_plus_one = 2 }
	add_to_variable = { half_senate_plus_one = 1 }
	round_variable = half_senate_plus_one
}
calculate_two_thirds_senate = {
	set_variable = { two_thirds_senate_plus_one = senate_total }
	multiply_variable = { two_thirds_senate_plus_one = 2}
	divide_variable = { two_thirds_senate_plus_one = 3 }
	add_to_variable = { two_thirds_senate_plus_one = 1 }
	round_variable = two_thirds_senate_plus_one
}
calculate_half_duma = {
	set_variable = { half_duma_plus_one = mp_total }
	divide_variable = { half_duma_plus_one = 2 }
	add_to_variable = { half_duma_plus_one = 1 }
	round_variable = half_duma_plus_one
}
calculate_two_thirds_duma = {
	set_variable = { two_thirds_duma_plus_one = mp_total }
	multiply_variable = { two_thirds_duma_plus_one = 2}
	divide_variable = { two_thirds_duma_plus_one = 3 }
	add_to_variable = { two_thirds_duma_plus_one = 1 }
	round_variable = two_thirds_duma_plus_one
}

RUS_setup_initial_state_popularities = {
	every_state = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_owned_by = RUS
					is_core_of = RUS
				}
				# Eastern Europe #
				is_owned_by = FIN
				is_owned_by = BAT
				is_owned_by = LIT
				is_owned_by = POL
				is_owned_by = GAL
				is_owned_by = WHR
				is_owned_by = UKR
				state = 78
				state = 1222
				state = 1320
				# Don-Kuban #
				is_owned_by = KUB
				is_owned_by = DKB
				is_owned_by = KLY
				# Caucasus #
				is_owned_by = MTR
				is_owned_by = AZE
				is_owned_by = GEO
				is_owned_by = ARM
				# Central Asia #
				is_owned_by = ALO
				is_owned_by = KYR
				is_owned_by = TRK
				is_owned_by = UZB
				# Far-East #
				is_owned_by = TRM
				is_owned_by = MON
				state = 537
				state = 555
			}
		}
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_party_pop_states_array = THIS }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_general_turnout = 0.7 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_senate_turnout = 0.3 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nonconservative_senate_state_turnout = 0.2 }
		set_variable = { RUS_conservative_senate_state_turnout = 1 }
		#RUS_clamp_all_state_pop = yes
		RUS_generate_state_popularities = yes
	}
}
RUS_generate_state_popularities = { #Fires at game start, and when absorbing colonies
	# Main Parties #
	
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@totalist }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@syndicalist }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@radical_socialist }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@social_democrat }
	if = {
		limit = { PREV = { tag = RUS} }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@social_liberal }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@market_liberal }
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@social_democrat }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@social_liberal }
	#Adjust for PSR/RSDRP
	multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.5 }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 0.5 }
	}
	set_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@market_liberal }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@market_liberal }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vns_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@social_conservative }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ep_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@paternal_autocrat }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@national_populist }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@national_populist }
	
	#Adjust for KDP, NSNP
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_pp_fraction = RUS_state_lkdp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_pp_fraction = RUS_state_rkdp_popularity }
	
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_pp_fraction = 0.2 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_pp_fraction = 0.4 }
		
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = RUS_state_lkdp_pp_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = RUS_state_rkdp_pp_fraction }
	subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = RUS_state_lkdp_pp_fraction }
	subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = RUS_state_rkdp_pp_fraction }
	
	multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.2 }
		
	# Non-Partisan #
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_msk_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_oblastniki_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_autonomists_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_federalists_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_monarchists_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_cossacks_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = 0 }
	
	# Other #
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@social_democrat }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.1 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = PREV.party_popularity@syndicalist }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 0.1 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_baltic_socialists_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bpsr_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bsrh_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bsdp_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bna_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bspzd_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ukp_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_upsr_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_usdrp_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_uvo_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_yuskvet_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ssdp_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_sogsk_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_hunchak_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_dashnak_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ramgavar_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_hummet_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_musavat_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_erk_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_alash_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_popularity = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_young_turkestan_popularity = 0 }
	
	#Adjust for ROVS
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_presidential_general_elections } }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_monarchists_fraction = RUS_state_rovs_popularity }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_independent_fraction = RUS_state_rovs_popularity }
		
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_monarchists_fraction = 0.3 }
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_independent_fraction = 0.3 }
		
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_monarchists_popularity = RUS_state_rovs_monarchists_fraction }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_rovs_independent_fraction }
	}	
	#Adjust for Organisations
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_vtssps_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_paole_zion_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_vks_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_vtssps_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_msk_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_paole_zion_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_vks_fraction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_vtssps_fraction = RUS_state_nsp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_msk_fraction = RUS_state_nsp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_vks_fraction = RUS_state_nsp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_bund_fraction = RUS_state_nsp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_psr_vks_fraction = RUS_state_psr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_vtssps_fraction = RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_msk_fraction = RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_bund_fraction = RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity }
		
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_paole_zion_fraction = 0.2 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_vks_fraction = 0.2 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_paole_zion_fraction = 0.2 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_vks_fraction = 0.25 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_bund_fraction = 0.1 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_vks_fraction = 0.2 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_msk_fraction = 0.1 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_bund_fraction = 0.2 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_psr_vks_fraction = 0.25 }
	
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = RUS_state_rkp_paole_zion_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = RUS_state_plsr_paole_zion_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = RUS_state_rkp_vks_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = RUS_state_plsr_vks_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = RUS_state_nsp_vks_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = RUS_state_psr_vks_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = RUS_state_nsp_bund_fraction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = RUS_state_rsdrp_bund_fraction }
		
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_independent_faction = RUS_state_plsr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_independent_faction = RUS_state_nsp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_psr_independent_faction = RUS_state_psr_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_independent_faction = RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_independent_faction = RUS_state_lkdp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_independent_faction = RUS_state_rkdp_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_vns_independent_faction = RUS_state_vns_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_ep_independent_faction = RUS_state_ep_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_independent_faction = RUS_state_rovs_popularity }
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_independent_faction = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
	
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_psr_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_vns_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_ep_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_independent_faction = 0.07 }
	
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_plsr_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_nsp_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_psr_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_rsdrp_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_lkdp_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_rkdp_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_vns_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_ep_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_rovs_independent_faction }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_independent_faction }
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_state_vns_monarchists_fraction = RUS_state_vns_popularity }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_state_vns_monarchists_fraction = 0.15 }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_state_monarchists_popularity = RUS_state_vns_monarchists_fraction }
		
	#Defining temporary state pop variables (to be reset by election)
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_msk_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vks_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_oblastniki_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_autonomists_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_federalists_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_monarchists_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_cossacks_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bund_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_baltic_socialists_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bpsr_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bsrh_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bsdp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bna_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bspzd_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ukp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_upsr_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_usdrp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_uvo_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_yuskvet_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ssdp_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_sogsk_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_hunchak_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_dashnak_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ramgavar_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_hummet_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_musavat_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_erk_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_alash_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_temp_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_young_turkestan_temp_pop = 0 }
	
	RUS_generate_special_state_popularities = yes
	
}
RUS_adjusted_state_pops = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.07 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 1.1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.03 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.06 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 1.1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 1.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 1.15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_socdem_pop = 1.15 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 1.15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.07 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 1.15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.07 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.07 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 1.15 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 1.15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.07 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 1.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 1.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.08 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 1.15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
		}
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 1.05 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = paternal_autocrat
			}
		}
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_temp_pop = 1.15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 1.1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 1.1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OWNER = {
				OR = {
					tag = FIN
					tag = EST
					tag = LIT
					tag = ALO
					tag = KYR
					tag = UZB
					tag = TRK
					tag = ARM
					tag = GEO
					tag = AZE
					tag = CRM
			}
		}
	}	
		set_variable = { RUS_state_autonomists_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
	}
	
	
}
RUS_generate_special_state_popularities = {
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_psr_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_pp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vns_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ep_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_independent_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_autonomists_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_federalists_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_oblastniki_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_msk_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_vks_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_monarchists_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_cossacks_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bund_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_baltic_socialists_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bpsr_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bsrh_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bsdp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bna_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_bspzd_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ukp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_upsr_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_usdrp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_uvo_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_yuskvet_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ssdp_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_sogsk_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_hunchak_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_dashnak_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_ramgavar_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_hummet_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_musavat_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_erk_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_alash_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_condition_pop = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_young_turkestan_condition_pop = 0 }
	
	#Industry makes states more leftist
	set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 10 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.125 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.075 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.3 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 0.25 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 1.3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 9 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.10 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.07 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.25 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.25 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 0.20 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 1.25 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 8 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.055 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.20 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.20 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 0.15 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 1.20 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 7 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.035 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.15 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 0.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 1.15 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 6 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.015 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 0.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 1.1 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 5 }
		}
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_popularity = 1.1 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 3 }
		}
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.05 }
	}
	### Urban Buff ###
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = one }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = 0.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 0.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0.15 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 1.5 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 1.5 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_popularity = 1.5 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.5 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.5 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.5 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.75 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = two }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = 0.15 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 0.1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.6 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.6 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.6 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.8 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = three }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.7 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.75 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.7 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.85 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = four }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_popularity = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0.025 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.8 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.85 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.8 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.9 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = five }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.9 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.95 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.9 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 0.95 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = six }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.015 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 0.025 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = seven }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 0.025 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_ep_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 1.05 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_psr_popularity = 0.9 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0.9 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_state_category = eight }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0.1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 0.1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 0.1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 0.025 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_ep_popularity = 1.2 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.1 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 1.1 }

		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_ep_popularity = 1.3 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.15 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_bund_popularity = 1.15 }

		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_popularity = 0.065}
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_pp_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_ep_popularity = 1.4 }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_popularity = 1.2 }

	### Cossacks ###

			OR = {
				is_core_of = DKB

				is_core_of = BRY
				state = 1208				
				state = 406				
				state = 561				
				state = 265			
		}
	}	
		set_variable = { RUS_state_cossacks_popularity = RUS_state_rovs_popularity }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_popularity = 0 }
}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				is_core_of = DKB
				is_core_of = KUB
		}
	}
		set_variable = { RUS_state_yuskvet_popularity = RUS_state_lkdp_popularity }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_popularity = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_cossacks_popularity = RUS_state_ep_popularity }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ep_popularity = 0 }
	}

	if = {

			is_core_of = AZE

	set_variable = { RUS_state_hummet_popularity = RUS_state_hummet_final_pop }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_musavat_popularity = RUS_state_musavat_final_pop }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_erk_popularity = RUS_state_erk_final_pop }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_alash_popularity = RUS_state_alash_final_pop }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_popularity = RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_final_pop }
	set_variable = { RUS_state_young_turkestan_popularity = RUS_state_young_turkestan_final_pop }
		}

RUS_calculate_polling_averages = {
	set_variable = { RUS_rkp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rovs_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_poll_votes = 0 }

	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_poll_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_bund_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_uvo_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_hummet_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_musavat_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_erk_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_alash_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_poll_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_poll_votes = 0 }

	set_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = 0 }
		
	every_owned_state = {
		RUS_get_final_poll_popularities = yes

		set_variable = { RUS_poll_vote_count_state = state_population_k }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_poll_vote_count_state = RUS_state_general_turnout }

		RUS_set_state_poll_votes_to_final_pop = yes
		RUS_multiply_state_poll_votes_to_poll_vote_count = yes
		RUS_round_state_poll_votes = yes
		RUS_count_total_state_poll_votes = yes

		}	
		
	RUS_round_poll_votes = yes
	
	#Adjust for banned parties
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_upsr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vks_poll_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_poll_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_poll_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_poll_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bund_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = lkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_poll_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vns_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = ep_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsnp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	
	RUS_count_total_poll_votes = yes
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_parliament_barrier }
	
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_poll_votes = RUS_lkdp_poll_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_poll_votes = RUS_pp_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_poll_votes = RUS_rkdp_poll_votes }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes = RUS_vns_poll_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes = RUS_ep_poll_votes }
	}
		
	# If below 5% fuck off 
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_plsr_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_nsp_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rus_election_1936 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_kdp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_kdp_poll_votes }
			set_variable = { RUS_kdp_poll_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_pp_poll_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
		}
	}
	else = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_lkdp_poll_votes }
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_pp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_pp_poll_votes }
			set_variable = { RUS_pp_poll_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_rkdp_poll_votes }
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_poll_votes = 0 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_vns_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_ep_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_nrpr_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_nsnp_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_poll_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_monarchists_poll_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_poll_votes = RUS_monarchists_poll_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_plsr_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nsp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_kdp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_lkdp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_pp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_rkdp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_vns_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_ep_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nrpr_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nsnp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_independent_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_vtssps_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_msk_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_vks_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_oblastniki_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_autonomists_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_federalists_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_monarchists_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_cossacks_poll_votes  }	
	set_variable = { RUS_bund_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_bund_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_paole_zion_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_baltic_socialists_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_bpsr_poll_votes } 
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_bsrh_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_bsdp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_bna_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_bspzd_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_ukp_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_upsr_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_usdrp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_uvo_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_uvo_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_yuskvet_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_ssdp_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_sogsk_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_hunchak_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_dashnak_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_ramgavar_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_hummet_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_hummet_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_musavat_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_musavat_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_erk_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_erk_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_alash_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_alash_poll_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_milliy_ittihod_poll_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_young_turkestan_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_wide_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_plsr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_wide_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nsp_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_wide_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_wide_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_plsr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nsp_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_rsdrp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_psr_rsdrp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_rsdrp_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_kdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_psr_kdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_kdp_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_vns_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_kdp_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_vns_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_vns_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_vns_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_ep_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_rpr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_rpr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nrpr_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_rrdo_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_psr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_rrdo_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_lkdp_poll_votes }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_socialists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_plsr_poll_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_socialists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_nsp_poll_votes }
	
	divide_variable = { RUS_wide_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_popular_front_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_rsdrp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_kdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_kdp_vns_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rpr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rrdo_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_socialists_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	
	divide_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_total_poll_votes }

RUS_round_state_senate_votes = {
	round_variable = RUS_plsr_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_psr_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_lkdp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_pp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rkdp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vns_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ep_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rovs_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nrpr_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsnp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_independent_state_senate_votes

	round_variable = RUS_vtssps_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_msk_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vks_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_oblastniki_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_autonomists_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_federalists_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_monarchists_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_cossacks_state_senate_votes
	
	round_variable = RUS_bund_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_paole_zion_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_baltic_socialists_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bpsr_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bsrh_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bsdp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bna_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bspzd_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ukp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_upsr_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_usdrp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_uvo_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_yuskvet_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ssdp_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_sogsk_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_hunchak_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_dashnak_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ramgavar_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_hummet_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_musavat_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_erk_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_alash_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_senate_votes
	round_variable = RUS_young_turkestan_state_senate_votes

	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_senate_votes < 0 }	}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_psr_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pp_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vns_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_ep_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rovs_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_rovs_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_independent_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_independent_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vtssps_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_msk_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vks_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vks_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_autonomists_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_federalists_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_federalists_state_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_monarchists_state_senate_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_state_senate_votes = 0 }

RUS_set_state_votes_to_final_pop = {
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes = RUS_state_plsr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes = RUS_state_nsp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes = RUS_state_psr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes = RUS_state_rsdrp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = RUS_state_lkdp_final_pop }

RUS_multiply_state_votes_to_vote_count = {
		multiply_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_pp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_rovs_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }

	multiply_variable = { RUS_vtssps_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_msk_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_vks_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_autonomists_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_federalists_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_monarchists_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_cossacks_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	
	multiply_variable = { RUS_bund_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_bpsr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_bsrh_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_bsdp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_bna_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_bspzd_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_ukp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_upsr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_usdrp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_uvo_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_ssdp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_sogsk_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }

RUS_round_state_votes = {
		round_variable = RUS_plsr_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_psr_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_lkdp_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_pp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rkdp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_vns_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_ep_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rovs_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nrpr_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsnp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_independent_state_votes

	round_variable = RUS_vtssps_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_msk_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vks_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_oblastniki_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_autonomists_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_federalists_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_monarchists_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_cossacks_state_votes
	
	round_variable = RUS_bund_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_paole_zion_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_baltic_socialists_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bpsr_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bsrh_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bsdp_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bna_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bspzd_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ukp_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_upsr_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_usdrp_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_uvo_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_yuskvet_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ssdp_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_sogsk_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_hunchak_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_dashnak_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ramgavar_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_hummet_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_musavat_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_erk_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_alash_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_votes
	round_variable = RUS_young_turkestan_state_votes
	
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes < 0 }	}
			set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pp_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_state_votes = 0 }
			}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rovs_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_rovs_state_votes = 0 }
			}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes < 0 } }
			set_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vtssps_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_state_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {

		set_variable = { RUS_msk_state_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vks_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vks_state_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_state_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_autonomists_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_state_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {

		set_variable = { RUS_federalists_state_votes = 0 }
	}
