	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_ssdp_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_sogsk_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_hunchak_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_dashnak_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_state_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_state_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_hummet_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_state_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_musavat_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_musavat_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_erk_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_alash_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_state_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_state_votes = 0 }
	}
}

RUS_multiply_state_poll_votes_to_poll_vote_count = {
	multiply_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_poll_votes = RUS_poll_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_poll_votes = RUS_poll_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_psr_state_poll_votes = RUS_poll_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_poll_votes = RUS_poll_vote_count_state }
	multiply_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_poll_votes = RUS_poll_vote_count_state }

RUS_round_state_poll_votes = {
	round_variable = RUS_plsr_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_psr_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_lkdp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_pp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rkdp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vns_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ep_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rovs_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nrpr_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsnp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_independent_state_poll_votes

	round_variable = RUS_vtssps_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_msk_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vks_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_oblastniki_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_autonomists_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_federalists_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_monarchists_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_cossacks_state_poll_votes
	
	round_variable = RUS_bund_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_paole_zion_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_baltic_socialists_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bpsr_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bsrh_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bsdp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bna_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_bspzd_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ukp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_upsr_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_usdrp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_uvo_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_yuskvet_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ssdp_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_sogsk_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_hunchak_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_dashnak_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ramgavar_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_hummet_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_musavat_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_erk_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_alash_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_poll_votes
	round_variable = RUS_young_turkestan_state_poll_votes
	
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_poll_votes < 0 }	}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_psr_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}			
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pp_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_poll_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { RUS_vns_state_poll_votes < 0 } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_poll_votes = 0 }

RUS_run_election = {
	RUS_clear_election_variables = yes
	set_variable = { RUS_rkp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rovs_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_bund_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_uvo_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_hummet_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_musavat_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_erk_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_alash_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_votes = 0 }
		
	set_variable = { RUS_total_votes = 0 }
	
	every_owned_state = {
		RUS_get_final_popularities = yes

		set_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = state_population_k }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = RUS_state_general_turnout }

		RUS_set_state_votes_to_final_pop = yes
		RUS_multiply_state_votes_to_vote_count = yes
		RUS_round_state_votes = yes
		RUS_count_total_state_votes = yes
		
		RUS_reset_temp_pop = yes
		
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR ([?RUS_plsr_state_votes]) - NSP ([?RUS_nsp_state_votes]) - PSR ([?RUS_psr_state_votes]) - RSDRP ([?RUS_rsdrp_state_votes]) - LKDP ([?RUS_lkdp_state_votes]) - PP ([?RUS_pp_state_votes]) - RKDP ([?RUS_rkdp_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: VNS ([?RUS_vns_state_votes]) - EP ([?RUS_ep_state_votes]) - NRPR ([?RUS_nrpr_state_votes]) - IND ([?RUS_independent_state_votes]) - AUT ([?RUS_autonomists_state_votes]) - FED ([?RUS_federalists_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: OBL ([?RUS_oblastniki_state_votes]) - RMS ([?RUS_monarchists_state_votes]) - COS ([?RUS_cossacks_state_votes]) - VTSSPS ([?RUS_vtssps_state_votes]) - MSK ([?RUS_msk_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: VKS ([?RUS_vks_state_votes]) - BUND ([?RUS_bund_state_votes]) - ZION ([?RUS_paole_zion_state_votes]) - BLT ([?RUS_baltic_socialists_state_votes]) - BPSR ([?RUS_bpsr_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: BSRH ([?RUS_bsrh_state_votes]) - BSDP ([?RUS_bsdp_state_votes]) - BNA ([?RUS_bna_state_votes]) - BSPZD ([?RUS_bspzd_state_votes]) - UKP  ([?RUS_ukp_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: UPSR ([?RUS_upsr_state_votes]) - USDRP ([?RUS_usdrp_state_votes]) - UVO ([?RUS_uvo_state_votes]) - YUS ([?RUS_yuskvet_state_votes]) - SSDP ([?RUS_ssdp_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: SOG ([?RUS_sogsk_state_votes]) - HUN ([?RUS_hunchak_state_votes]) - DAS ([?RUS_dashnak_state_votes]) - RAM ([?RUS_ramgavar_state_votes]) - HUM ([?RUS_hummet_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: MUS ([?RUS_musavat_state_votes]) - ERK ([?RUS_erk_state_votes]) - ALA ([?RUS_alash_state_votes]) - MLI ([?RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_votes]) - YTP ([?RUS_young_turkestan_state_votes])"
	}
	
	RUS_round_votes = yes
	
	#Adjust for banned parties
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_upsr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vks_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_state_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_state_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bund_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = lkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = pp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vns_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = ep_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsnp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes = 0 }
	}
	
	RUS_count_total_votes = yes
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_total_votes }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_parliament_barrier }
	
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = RUS_lkdp_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = RUS_pp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = RUS_rkdp_votes }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_votes = RUS_vns_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_votes = RUS_ep_votes }
	}
		
	# If below 5% fuck off 
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_plsr_votes }
		log = "PLSR < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_plsr_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nsp_votes }
		log = "NSP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_nsp_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_psr_votes }
		log = "PSR < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_psr_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_rsdrp_votes }
		log = "RSDRP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_rsdrp_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rus_election_1936 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_kdp_votes }
			log = "KDP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_kdp_votes]"
			set_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_pp_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
		}
	}
	else = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_lkdp_votes }
			log = "LKDP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_lkdp_votes]"
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_pp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_pp_votes }
			log = "PP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_pp_votes]"
			set_variable = { RUS_pp_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_rkdp_votes }
			log = "RKDP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_rkdp_votes]"
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_vns_votes }
		log = "VNS < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_vns_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_ep_votes }
		log = "EP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_ep_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_vns_ep_votes }
		log = "VNS-EP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_vns_ep_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nrpr_votes }
		log = "NRPR < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_nrpr_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nsnp_votes }
		log = "NSNP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_nsnp_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_monarchists_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_monarchists_votes }
		log = "RMS < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_monarchists_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_votes = 0 }
	}
	# Minority parties go with respect coalitions
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_baltic_socialists_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_dashnak_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_bpsr_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_upsr_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_upsr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_bsdp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_usdrp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_ssdp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_bsrh_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_ukp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_hummet_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_hunchak_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_pp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_bna_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bna_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_sogsk_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_musavat_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_musavat_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_bspzd_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_uvo_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_uvo_votes }
		log = "UVO < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_uvo_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_uvo_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_pp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_yuskvet_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_ramgavar_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_alash_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_milliy_ittihod_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_young_turkestan_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_votes = 0 }
	}
	
	
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_vote = RUS_plsr_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_vote = RUS_nsp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_vote = RUS_psr_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_vote = RUS_rsdrp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_vote = RUS_kdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_lkdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_vote = RUS_pp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_rkdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_vote = RUS_vns_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_vote = RUS_ep_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_vote = RUS_nrpr_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_vote = RUS_nsnp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_vote = RUS_independent_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_percentage_vote = RUS_vtssps_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_percentage_vote = RUS_msk_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_percentage_vote = RUS_vks_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_percentage_vote = RUS_oblastniki_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_percentage_vote = RUS_autonomists_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_percentage_vote = RUS_federalists_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_percentage_vote = RUS_monarchists_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_percentage_vote = RUS_cossacks_votes  }	
	set_variable = { RUS_bund_percentage_vote = RUS_bund_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_percentage_vote = RUS_paole_zion_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_vote = RUS_baltic_socialists_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_percentage_vote = RUS_bpsr_votes } 
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_percentage_vote = RUS_bsrh_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_percentage_vote = RUS_bsdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_percentage_vote = RUS_bna_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_percentage_vote = RUS_bspzd_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_percentage_vote = RUS_ukp_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_percentage_vote = RUS_upsr_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_percentage_vote = RUS_usdrp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_uvo_percentage_vote = RUS_uvo_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_percentage_vote = RUS_yuskvet_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_percentage_vote = RUS_ssdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_percentage_vote = RUS_sogsk_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_percentage_vote = RUS_hunchak_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_percentage_vote = RUS_dashnak_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_percentage_vote = RUS_ramgavar_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_hummet_percentage_vote = RUS_hummet_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_musavat_percentage_vote = RUS_musavat_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_erk_percentage_vote = RUS_erk_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_alash_percentage_vote = RUS_alash_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_vote = RUS_milliy_ittihod_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_vote = RUS_young_turkestan_votes }
	
	divide_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vtssps_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_msk_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vks_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_autonomists_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_federalists_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_monarchists_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_cossacks_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bund_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bpsr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bsrh_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bsdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bna_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bspzd_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ukp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_upsr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_usdrp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_uvo_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ssdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_sogsk_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_hunchak_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_dashnak_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_hummet_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_musavat_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_erk_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_alash_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^1 = RUS_plsr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^2 = RUS_nsp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 = RUS_psr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 = RUS_rsdrp_percentage_vote }
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = kdp_united
		}
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^5 = RUS_kdp_percentage_vote }
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^5 = RUS_lkdp_percentage_vote }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^6 = RUS_pp_percentage_vote }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^7 = RUS_rkdp_percentage_vote }
	}
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 = RUS_vns_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 = RUS_ep_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = RUS_nrpr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = RUS_nsnp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = RUS_independent_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^17 = RUS_vtssps_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^19 = RUS_msk_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^18 = RUS_vks_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^13 = RUS_oblastniki_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^14 = RUS_autonomists_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^15 = RUS_federalists_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^10 = RUS_monarchists_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^21 = RUS_bund_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^20 = RUS_paole_zion_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^45 = RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^22 = RUS_bpsr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^23 = RUS_bsrh_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^24 = RUS_bsdp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^25 = RUS_bna_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^26 = RUS_bspzd_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^27 = RUS_ukp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^28 = RUS_upsr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^29 = RUS_usdrp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^30 = RUS_uvo_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^31 = RUS_cossacks_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^32 = RUS_yuskvet_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^33 = RUS_ssdp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^34 = RUS_sogsk_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^35 = RUS_hunchak_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^36 = RUS_dashnak_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^37 = RUS_ramgavar_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^38 = RUS_hummet_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^39 = RUS_musavat_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^40 = RUS_erk_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^41 = RUS_alash_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^42 = RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^43 = RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_vote }
	
	
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i

		multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^i = 550 }
		round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^i
	}
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i
		
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^i }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 550 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 553 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 552 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 551 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 549 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 548 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 547 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 546 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 4 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 545 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 544 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 6 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 543 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 7 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 542 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 8 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 541 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 9 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 540 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 10 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 539 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 11 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 538 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 12 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 537 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 13 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 536 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 14 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 535 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 15 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 534 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 16 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 533 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 17 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 532 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 18 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 531 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 19 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 530 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 20 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 529 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 21 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 528 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 22 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 527 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 23 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 526 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 24 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 525 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 25 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 524 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 26 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 523 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 27 }
		}
	}
	
	set_variable = { plsr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
	set_variable = { nsp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
	set_variable = { psr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
	set_variable = { rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	set_variable = { lkdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
	set_variable = { pp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^6 }
	set_variable = { rkdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
	set_variable = { vns_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
	set_variable = { ep_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
	set_variable = { nrpr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
	set_variable = { nsnp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
	set_variable = { independent_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^16 }
	set_variable = { vtssps_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^17  }
	set_variable = { msk_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^19 }
	set_variable = { vks_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^18 }
	set_variable = { oblastniki_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^13 }
	set_variable = { autonomists_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^14 }
	set_variable = { federalists_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^15  }
	set_variable = { monarchists_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^10  }
	set_variable = { cossacks_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^31  }	
	set_variable = { bund_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^21 }
	set_variable = { paole_zion_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^20 } 
	set_variable = { baltic_socialists_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^45 }
	set_variable = { bpsr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^22  }
	set_variable = { bsrh_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^23 }
	set_variable = { bsdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^24 }
	set_variable = { bna_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^25 }
	set_variable = { bspzd_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^26 } 
	set_variable = { ukp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^27  }
	set_variable = { upsr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^28  }
	set_variable = { usdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^29 }
	set_variable = { uvo_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^30 }
	set_variable = { yuskvet_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^32 }
	set_variable = { ssdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^33 }
	set_variable = { sogsk_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^34 }
	set_variable = { hunchak_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^35 } 
	set_variable = { dashnak_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^36 }
	set_variable = { ramgavar_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^37  }
	set_variable = { hummat_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^38  }
	set_variable = { musavat_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^39  }
	set_variable = { erk_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^40 }
	set_variable = { alash_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^41  }
	set_variable = { milliy_ittihod_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^42 }
	set_variable = { young_turkestan_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^43  }
	# Count for coalitions
	if = {
		limit = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rus_election_1936 } 
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			add_to_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			add_to_variable = { popular_front_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { socialists_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { socialists_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
		}
		set_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
		add_to_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^6 }
		add_to_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { psr_kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { psr_kdp_mp = kdp_mp }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { kdp_vns_mp = kdp_mp }
			add_to_variable = { kdp_vns_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
			}
			set_variable = { vns_ep_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			add_to_variable = { vns_ep_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
		}
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = { socialists_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { popular_front_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_kdp_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { kdp_vns_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_ep_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp = 0 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties
			}
			set_variable = { rrdo_mp = psr_mp }
			add_to_variable = { rrdo_mp = lkdp_mp }
			set_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
			add_to_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^6 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
			add_to_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^6 }
			add_to_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia
			}
			set_variable = { rpr_mp = psr_mp }
			add_to_variable = { rpr_mp = nrpr_mp }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_wide_popular_front_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_popular_front_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_rsdrp_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_kdp_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { kdp_vns_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_kdp_vns_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { vns_ep_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_ep_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { socialists_mp > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { socialists_mp > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { socialists_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { socialists_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }

			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > psr_kdp_mp }

	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_PLSR_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_NSP_CAMPAIGN

	round_variable = RUS_total_votes
	log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR([?Duma_Party_Seats^1]) - NSP([?Duma_Party_Seats^2]) - RSDRP([?Duma_Party_Seats^4]) - PSR([?Duma_Party_Seats^3]) - LKDP([?lkdp_mp]) - PP([?pp_mp]) - RKDP([?rkdp_mp])"

	log = "BPSR ([?Duma_Party_Seats^22]) - BSRH([?Duma_Party_Seats^23]) - BSDP([?Duma_Party_Seats^24]) - BNA([?Duma_Party_Seats^25]) - BSPZD([?Duma_Party_Seats^26])"
	log = "UKP ([?Duma_Party_Seats^27]) - UPSR([?Duma_Party_Seats^28]) - USDRP([?Duma_Party_Seats^29]) - UVO([?Duma_Party_Seats^30]) - COS([?Duma_Party_Seats^31])"
	log = "YUS ([?Duma_Party_Seats^32]) - SSDP([?Duma_Party_Seats^33]) - SOG([?Duma_Party_Seats^34]) - HUN([?Duma_Party_Seats^35]) - DAS([?Duma_Party_Seats^36])"
	log = "RAM ([?Duma_Party_Seats^37]) - HUM([?Duma_Party_Seats^38]) - MUS([?Duma_Party_Seats^39]) - ERK([?Duma_Party_Seats^40]) - ALA([?Duma_Party_Seats^41])"
	log = "MLI ([?Duma_Party_Seats^42]) - YTP([?Duma_Party_Seats^43])"
	for_each_loop ={
		array = Duma_Party_Identity
		value = status
		index = i
		
		# Calculating total support
		if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 2 } 
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^i < 1 }
						check_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^i < 1 }
					}
				}
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 0 }
			}
			else = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
	mp_support_calc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
	RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
	every_owned_state = { RUS_set_new_popularities_after_election = yes } 
}

RUS_run_senate_election = {
	RUS_clear_senate_election_variables = yes
	set_variable = { RUS_rkp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rovs_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_senate_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_senate_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_bund_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_senate_votes = 0 }

	set_variable = { RUS_rkp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }

	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rovs_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		
	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
