	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_uvo_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_hummet_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_musavat_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_erk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_alash_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		
	set_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_total_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	
	every_owned_state = {
		RUS_get_final_popularities = yes
		
		set_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = state_population_k }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = RUS_state_general_turnout }
		
		RUS_set_state_senate_votes_to_final_pop = yes
		RUS_multiply_state_senate_votes_to_vote_count = yes
		RUS_round_state_senate_votes = yes
		RUS_count_total_state_senate_votes = yes
		
		RUS_get_regional_senators = yes
		set_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_plsr_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_nsp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_psr_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_rsdrp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_lkdp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_rkdp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_vns_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_ep_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_nrpr_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_nsnp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_senate_votes = RUS_independent_state_senate_votes }

		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_plsr_senate_votes = RUS_plsr_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nsp_senate_votes = RUS_nsp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_psr_senate_votes = RUS_psr_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes = RUS_rsdrp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_lkdp_senate_votes = RUS_lkdp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_rkdp_senate_votes = RUS_rkdp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_vns_senate_votes = RUS_vns_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_ep_senate_votes = RUS_ep_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nrpr_senate_votes = RUS_nrpr_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nsnp_senate_votes = RUS_nsnp_state_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_independent_senate_votes = RUS_independent_state_senate_votes }

		
		#Resetting temp popularity
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bund_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_baltic_socialists_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bpsr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bsrh_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bsdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bna_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bspzd_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ukp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_upsr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_usdrp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_uvo_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_yuskvet_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ssdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_sogsk_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_hunchak_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_dashnak_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ramgavar_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_hummet_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_musavat_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_erk_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_alash_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_young_turkestan_temp_pop = 0 }

		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: PLSR ([?RUS_plsr_state_senate_votes]) - NSP ([?RUS_nsp_state_senate_votes]) - PSR ([?RUS_psr_state_senate_votes]) - RSDRP ([?RUS_rsdrp_state_senate_votes]) - LKDP ([?RUS_lkdp_state_senate_votes]) - PP ([?RUS_pp_state_senate_votes]) - RKDP ([?RUS_rkdp_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: VNS ([?RUS_vns_state_senate_votes]) - EP ([?RUS_ep_state_senate_votes]) - NRPR ([?RUS_nrpr_state_senate_votes]) - IND ([?RUS_independent_state_senate_votes]) - AUT ([?RUS_autonomists_state_senate_votes]) - FED ([?RUS_federalists_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: OBL ([?RUS_oblastniki_state_senate_votes]) - RMS ([?RUS_monarchists_state_senate_votes]) - COS ([?RUS_cossacks_state_senate_votes]) - VTSSPS ([?RUS_vtssps_state_senate_votes]) - MSK ([?RUS_msk_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: VKS ([?RUS_vks_state_senate_votes]) - BUND ([?RUS_bund_state_senate_votes]) - ZION ([?RUS_paole_zion_state_senate_votes]) - BLT ([?RUS_baltic_socialists_state_senate_votes]) - BPSR ([?RUS_bpsr_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: BSRH ([?RUS_bsrh_state_senate_votes]) - BSDP ([?RUS_bsdp_state_senate_votes]) - BNA ([?RUS_bna_state_senate_votes]) - BSPZD ([?RUS_bspzd_state_senate_votes]) - UKP  ([?RUS_ukp_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: UPSR ([?RUS_upsr_state_senate_votes]) - USDRP ([?RUS_usdrp_state_senate_votes]) - UVO ([?RUS_uvo_state_senate_votes]) - YUS ([?RUS_yuskvet_state_senate_votes]) - SSDP ([?RUS_ssdp_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: SOG ([?RUS_sogsk_state_senate_votes]) - HUN ([?RUS_hunchak_state_senate_votes]) - DAS ([?RUS_dashnak_state_senate_votes]) - RAM ([?RUS_ramgavar_state_senate_votes]) - HUM ([?RUS_hummet_state_senate_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName] G: MUS ([?RUS_musavat_state_senate_votes]) - ERK ([?RUS_erk_state_senate_votes]) - ALA ([?RUS_alash_state_senate_votes]) - MLI ([?RUS_milliy_ittihod_state_senate_votes]) - YTP ([?RUS_young_turkestan_state_senate_votes])"
	}
	RUS_round_senate_votes = yes
	
	#Adjust for banned parties
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_upsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_upsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vks_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vks_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_erk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_msk_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_state_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bund_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_bund_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = lkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vns_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = ep_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsnp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_senate_regional_votes = 0 }
	}
	RUS_count_total_senate_votes = yes
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_total_votes }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_parliament_barrier }
	
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_senate_votes = RUS_lkdp_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_senate_votes = RUS_pp_senate_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_senate_votes = RUS_rkdp_senate_votes }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition } }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes = RUS_vns_senate_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes = RUS_ep_senate_votes }
	}
		
	# If below 5% fuck off (only for General Senate Elections, not regional!)
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_plsr_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_nsp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_psr_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rus_election_1936 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_kdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_kdp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_kdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		}
	}
	else = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_lkdp_senate_votes }
			log = "LKDP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_lkdp_senate_votes]"
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_pp_senate_votes }
			log = "PP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_pp_senate_votes]"
			set_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_rkdp_senate_votes }
			log = "RKDP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_rkdp_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_vns_senate_votes }
		log = "VNS < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_vns_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_ep_senate_votes }
		log = "EP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_ep_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes }
		log = "VNS-EP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_ep_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_nrpr_senate_votes }
		log = "NRPR < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_nrpr_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_nsnp_senate_votes }
		log = "NSNP < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_nsnp_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_monarchists_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_monarchists_senate_votes }
		log = "RMS < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_monarchists_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	# Minority parties go with respect coalitions
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_dashnak_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_bpsr_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_upsr_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_upsr_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_bsdp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_usdrp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_ssdp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_bsrh_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_ukp_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ukp_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_hummet_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_hummet_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_hunchak_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_bna_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bna_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_sogsk_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_musavat_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_musavat_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_bspzd_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_uvo_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_uvo_senate_votes }
		log = "UVO < [?RUS_temp_parliament_barrier] with [?RUS_uvo_senate_votes]"
		set_variable = { RUS_uvo_senate_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_pp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_senate_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_yuskvet_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_ramgavar_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_alash_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_alash_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_milliy_ittihod_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_senate_votes = 0 }
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_senate_votes = RUS_young_turkestan_senate_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_senate_votes = 0 }
	}		
		
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_plsr_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_nsp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_psr_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_rsdrp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_kdp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_lkdp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_pp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_rkdp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_vns_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_ep_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_nrpr_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_nsnp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_independent_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vtssps_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_vtssps_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_msk_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_msk_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vks_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_vks_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_oblastniki_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_autonomists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_autonomists_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_federalists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_federalists_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_monarchists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_monarchists_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_cossacks_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_cossacks_senate_regional_votes  }	
	set_variable = { RUS_bund_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_bund_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_paole_zion_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_baltic_socialists_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bpsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_bpsr_senate_regional_votes } 
	set_variable = { RUS_bsrh_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_bsrh_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bsdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_bsdp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bna_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_bna_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_bspzd_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_bspzd_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_ukp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_ukp_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_upsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_upsr_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_usdrp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_usdrp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_uvo_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_uvo_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_yuskvet_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ssdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_ssdp_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_sogsk_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_sogsk_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_hunchak_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_hunchak_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_dashnak_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_dashnak_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_ramgavar_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_hummet_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_hummet_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_musavat_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_musavat_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_erk_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_erk_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_alash_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_alash_senate_regional_votes  }
	set_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_milliy_ittihod_senate_regional_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_young_turkestan_senate_regional_votes }
	
	divide_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vtssps_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_msk_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vks_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_autonomists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_federalists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_monarchists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_cossacks_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bund_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bpsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bsrh_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bsdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bna_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bspzd_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ukp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_upsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_usdrp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_uvo_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ssdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_sogsk_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_hunchak_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_dashnak_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_hummet_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_musavat_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_erk_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_alash_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_senate_regional_vote = RUS_total_senate_regional_votes }
	
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^1 = RUS_plsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^2 = RUS_nsp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^3 = RUS_psr_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^4 = RUS_rsdrp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = kdp_united
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^5 = RUS_kdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^5 = RUS_lkdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^6 = RUS_pp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^7 = RUS_rkdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	}
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^8 = RUS_vns_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^9 = RUS_ep_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = RUS_nrpr_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = RUS_nsnp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = RUS_independent_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^17 = RUS_vtssps_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^19 = RUS_msk_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^18 = RUS_vks_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^13 = RUS_oblastniki_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^14 = RUS_autonomists_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^15 = RUS_federalists_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^10 = RUS_monarchists_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^21 = RUS_bund_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^20 = RUS_paole_zion_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^45 = RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^22 = RUS_bpsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^23 = RUS_bsrh_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^24 = RUS_bsdp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^25 = RUS_bna_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^26 = RUS_bspzd_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^27 = RUS_ukp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^28 = RUS_upsr_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^29 = RUS_usdrp_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^30 = RUS_uvo_percentage_senate_regional_vote }

	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^37 = RUS_ramgavar_percentage_senate_regional_vote }

	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^43 = RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_senate_regional_vote }
	
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i
	
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^i = senators_election_regional_total }
		round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^i
	}

	set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i
	
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^i }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = 3 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = 2 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = 1 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -1 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -2 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -3 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -4 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 4 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -5 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 5 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -6 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 6 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -7 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_regional_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 7 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = senators_election_regional_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_regional_total_temp = -8 }

			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 = 18 }
		}

		value = temp_most_general_seats
		index = i
	
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: Most General Seats: [?temp_most_general_seats^i]"
	}

	log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR([?Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^1]) - NSP([?Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^2]) - RSDRP([?Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^4]) - PSR([?Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^3]) - LKDP([?lkdp_mp]) - PP([?pp_mp]) - RKDP([?rkdp_mp])"
