	divide_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_pp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vtssps_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_msk_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vks_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_oblastniki_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_autonomists_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_federalists_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_monarchists_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_cossacks_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bund_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_paole_zion_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bpsr_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bsrh_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bsdp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bna_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_bspzd_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ukp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_upsr_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_usdrp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_uvo_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_yuskvet_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ssdp_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_sogsk_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_hunchak_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_dashnak_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ramgavar_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_hummet_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_musavat_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_erk_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_alash_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_senate_vote = RUS_total_senate_votes }
	
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^1 = RUS_plsr_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^2 = RUS_nsp_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^3 = RUS_psr_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^4 = RUS_rsdrp_percentage_senate_vote }
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = kdp_united
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^5 = RUS_kdp_percentage_senate_vote }
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^5 = RUS_lkdp_percentage_senate_vote }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^6 = RUS_pp_percentage_senate_vote }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^7 = RUS_rkdp_percentage_senate_vote }
	}
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^8 = RUS_vns_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^9 = RUS_ep_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = RUS_nrpr_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = RUS_nsnp_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = RUS_independent_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^17 = RUS_vtssps_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^19 = RUS_msk_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^18 = RUS_vks_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^13 = RUS_oblastniki_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^14 = RUS_autonomists_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^15 = RUS_federalists_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^10 = RUS_monarchists_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^21 = RUS_bund_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^20 = RUS_paole_zion_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^45 = RUS_baltic_socialists_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^22 = RUS_bpsr_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^23 = RUS_bsrh_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^24 = RUS_bsdp_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^25 = RUS_bna_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^26 = RUS_bspzd_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^27 = RUS_ukp_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^28 = RUS_upsr_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^29 = RUS_usdrp_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^30 = RUS_uvo_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^31 = RUS_cossacks_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^32 = RUS_yuskvet_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^33 = RUS_ssdp_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^34 = RUS_sogsk_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^35 = RUS_hunchak_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^36 = RUS_dashnak_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^37 = RUS_ramgavar_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^38 = RUS_hummet_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^39 = RUS_musavat_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^40 = RUS_erk_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^41 = RUS_alash_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^42 = RUS_milliy_ittihod_percentage_senate_vote }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^43 = RUS_young_turkestan_percentage_senate_vote }
	
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_General_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i

		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^i = senators_election_total }
		round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^i
	}
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_General_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i
		
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Senate_Party_General_Seats^i }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = 3 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = 2 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = 1 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -1 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -2 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -3 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -4 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 4 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -5 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -6 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 6 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -7 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 7 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -8 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 8 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -9 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 9 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -10 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 10 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -11 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 11 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -12 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 12 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -13 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 13 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -14 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 14 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -15 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 15 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -16 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
		}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 16 }
	}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -17 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 17 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = senators_election_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { senators_election_total_temp = -18 }
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senators_election_total_temp }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 = 18 }
		}			
	}
	
	
	set_variable = { plsr_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^1 }
	set_variable = { nsp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^2 }
	set_variable = { psr_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^3 }
	set_variable = { rsdrp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^4 }
	set_variable = { lkdp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^5 }
	set_variable = { pp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^6 }
	set_variable = { rkdp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^7 }
	set_variable = { vns_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^8 }
	set_variable = { ep_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^9 }
	set_variable = { nrpr_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
	set_variable = { nsnp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
	set_variable = { independent_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 }
	set_variable = { vtssps_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^17  }
	set_variable = { msk_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^19 }
	set_variable = { vks_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^18 }
	set_variable = { oblastniki_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^13 }
	set_variable = { autonomists_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^14 }
	set_variable = { federalists_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^15  }
	set_variable = { monarchists_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^10  }
	set_variable = { cossacks_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^31  }	
	set_variable = { bund_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^21 }
	set_variable = { paole_zion_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^20 } 
	set_variable = { baltic_socialists_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^45 }
	set_variable = { bpsr_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^22  }
	set_variable = { bsrh_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^23 }
	set_variable = { bsdp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^24 }
	set_variable = { bna_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^25 }
	set_variable = { bspzd_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^26 } 
	set_variable = { ukp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^27  }
	set_variable = { upsr_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^28  }
	set_variable = { usdrp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^29 }
	set_variable = { uvo_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^30 }
	set_variable = { yuskvet_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^32 }
	set_variable = { ssdp_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^33 }
	set_variable = { sogsk_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^34 }
	set_variable = { hunchak_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^35 } 
	set_variable = { dashnak_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^36 }
	set_variable = { ramgavar_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^37  }
	set_variable = { hummat_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^38  }
	set_variable = { musavat_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^39  }
	set_variable = { erk_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^40 }
	set_variable = { alash_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^41  }
	set_variable = { milliy_ittihod_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^42 }
	set_variable = { young_turkestan_senators = Senate_Party_General_Seats^43  }
	
	find_highest_in_array = {
		array = Senate_Party_General_Seats
		value = temp_most_general_seats
		index = i
		
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: Most General Seats: [?temp_most_general_seats^i]"
	}
		
	round_variable = RUS_total_senate_votes
	log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^1]) - NSP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^2]) - RSDRP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^4]) - PSR([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^3]) - LKDP([?lkdp_mp]) - PP([?pp_mp]) - RKDP([?rkdp_mp])"
	log = "VNS([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^8]) - EP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^9]) - NRPR([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^12]) - NSNP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^11]) - IND([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^16])"
	log = "VTSSPS ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^17]) - MSK([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^19]) - VKS([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^18]) - OBL([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^13]) - AUT([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^14])"
	log = "FED ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^15]) - RMS([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^10]) - BUND([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^21]) - ZION([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^20]) - BLT([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^45])"
	log = "BPSR ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^22]) - BSRH([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^23]) - BSDP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^24]) - BNA([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^25]) - BSPZD([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^26])"
	log = "UKP ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^27]) - UPSR([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^28]) - USDRP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^29]) - UVO([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^30]) - COS([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^31])"
	log = "YUS ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^32]) - SSDP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^33]) - SOG([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^34]) - HUN([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^35]) - DAS([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^36])"
	log = "RAM ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^37]) - HUM([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^38]) - MUS([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^39]) - ERK([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^40]) - ALA([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^41])"
	log = "MLI ([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^42]) - YTP([?Senate_Party_General_Seats^43])"
	
	final_senators_recalc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
	RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
}
RUS_run_1937_election = {
	RUS_clear_election_variables = yes
	set_variable = { RUS_rkp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rovs_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_total_votes = 0 }
	
	every_owned_state = {
		RUS_get_final_popularities = yes

		set_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = state_population_k }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = RUS_state_general_turnout }

		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes = RUS_state_plsr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes = RUS_state_nsp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes = RUS_state_lkdp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes = RUS_state_rsdrp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = RUS_state_rkdp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes = RUS_state_rkdp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes = RUS_state_vns_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes = RUS_state_ep_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes = RUS_state_nrpr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes = RUS_state_nsnp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes = RUS_state_independent_final_pop }
		
		divide_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = 2 }
		divide_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes = 2 }

		multiply_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }

		round_variable = RUS_plsr_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_psr_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_lkdp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rkdp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_vns_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_ep_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nrpr_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsnp_state_votes
		round_variable = RUS_independent_state_votes

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_ep_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_independent_state_votes = 0 }
		}	
		
		set_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_plsr_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_nsp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_psr_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_rsdrp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_lkdp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_rkdp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_vns_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_ep_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_nrpr_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_nsnp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_votes = RUS_independent_state_votes }

		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_plsr_votes = RUS_plsr_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nsp_votes = RUS_nsp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_psr_votes = RUS_psr_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_rsdrp_votes = RUS_rsdrp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_lkdp_votes = RUS_lkdp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_rkdp_votes = RUS_rkdp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_vns_votes = RUS_vns_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_ep_votes = RUS_ep_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nrpr_votes = RUS_nrpr_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nsnp_votes = RUS_nsnp_state_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_independent_votes = RUS_independent_state_votes }

		
		#Resetting temp popularity
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_rovs_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bund_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_baltic_socialists_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bpsr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bsrh_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bsdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bna_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_bspzd_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ukp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_upsr_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_usdrp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_uvo_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_yuskvet_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ssdp_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_sogsk_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_hunchak_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_dashnak_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_ramgavar_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_hummet_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_musavat_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_erk_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_alash_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_milliy_ittihod_temp_pop = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_state_young_turkestan_temp_pop = 0 }

		log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR ([?RUS_plsr_state_votes]) - NSP ([?RUS_nsp_state_votes]) - PSR ([?RUS_psr_state_votes]) - RSDRP ([?RUS_rsdrp_state_votes]) - LKDP ([?RUS_lkdp_state_votes]) - RKDP ([?RUS_rkdp_state_votes]) - VNS ([?RUS_vns_state_votes])"
		log = "[THIS.GetName]: EP ([?RUS_ep_state_votes]) - NRPR ([?RUS_nrpr_state_votes]) - IND ([?RUS_independent_state_votes]) - TOTAL VOTES ([?RUS_total_state_votes])"
	}
	round_variable = RUS_plsr_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsp_votes
	round_variable = RUS_psr_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_votes
	round_variable = RUS_lkdp_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rkdp_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vns_votes
	round_variable = RUS_ep_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nrpr_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsnp_votes
	round_variable = RUS_independent_votes
	
	#Adjust for banned parties
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = lkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = rkdp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vns_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = ep_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nsnp_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes = 0 }
	}
	
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_plsr_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nsp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_psr_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_rsdrp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_lkdp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_rkdp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_vns_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_ep_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nrpr_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nsnp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_independent_votes }
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_total_votes }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_parliament_barrier }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = RUS_lkdp_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = RUS_rkdp_votes }
	
	# If below 5% fuck off 
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_psr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_democratic_block_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_psr_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_democratic_block_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_rsdrp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_democratic_block_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_kdp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_kdp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_vns_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_ep_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nrpr_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes < RUS_temp_parliament_barrier }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_total_votes = RUS_nsnp_votes }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_votes = 0 }
	}
	
	
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_vote = RUS_plsr_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_vote = RUS_nsp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_vote = RUS_psr_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_vote = RUS_rsdrp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_lkdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_rkdp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_vote = RUS_vns_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_vote = RUS_ep_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_vote = RUS_nrpr_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_vote = RUS_nsnp_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_vote = RUS_independent_votes }
	
	divide_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	divide_variable = { RUS_independent_percentage_vote = RUS_total_votes }
	
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^1 = RUS_plsr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^2 = RUS_nsp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 = RUS_psr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 = RUS_rsdrp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^5 = RUS_lkdp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^7 = RUS_rkdp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 = RUS_vns_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 = RUS_ep_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = RUS_nrpr_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = RUS_nsnp_percentage_vote }
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = RUS_independent_percentage_vote }
	
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^1 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^2 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^5 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^7 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 550 }
	multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 550 }

	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^1 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^2 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^3 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^4 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^5 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^7 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^8 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^9 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^12 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11 
	round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^16 
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
	
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Duma_Party_Seats^16 }
	
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 550 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 553 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 552 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 551 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 549 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 548 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 547 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
	}
	
	set_variable = { plsr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
	set_variable = { nsp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
	set_variable = { psr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
	set_variable = { rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	set_variable = { lkdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
	set_variable = { rkdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
	set_variable = { vns_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
	set_variable = { ep_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
	set_variable = { nrpr_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
	set_variable = { nsnp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
	set_variable = { independent_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^16 }
	
	# Count for coalitions
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
		}
		set_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
		add_to_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	}
	set_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
	add_to_variable = { kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }

	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
		}
		set_variable = { psr_kdp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
		add_to_variable = { psr_kdp_mp = kdp_mp }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
		}
		set_variable = { dem_block_mp = kdp_mp }
		add_to_variable = { dem_block_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
		add_to_variable = { dem_block_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { wide_popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_wide_popular_front_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { popular_front_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_popular_front_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { psr_rsdrp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_rsdrp_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { psr_kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_kdp_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { dem_block_mp > RUS_vns_votes }
			check_variable = { dem_block_mp > RUS_ep_votes }
			check_variable = { dem_block_mp > RUS_nrpr_votes }
			check_variable = { dem_block_mp > RUS_nsnp_votes }
			has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_democratic_block_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rsdrp_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > rpr_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { kdp_mp > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_kdp_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > dem_block_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^8 > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > dem_block_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^9 > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_ep_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > dem_block_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 > Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nrpr_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > socialists_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > wide_popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > popular_front_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > psr_rsdrp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > psr_kdp_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > dem_block_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > kdp_vns_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > vns_ep_mp }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 > Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nsnp_victory
	}
	round_variable = RUS_total_votes
	log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR([?Duma_Party_Seats^1]) - NSP([?Duma_Party_Seats^2]) - RSDRP([?Duma_Party_Seats^4]) - PSR([?Duma_Party_Seats^3]) - KDP([?kdp_mp])"
	log = "VNS([?Duma_Party_Seats^8]) - EP([?Duma_Party_Seats^9]) - NRPR([?Duma_Party_Seats^12]) - NSNP([?Duma_Party_Seats^11]) - IND([?Duma_Party_Seats^16])"
	mp_support_calc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
	RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
}
RUS_clear_all_preelection_candidates = {
	clr_country_flag = lozovsky_rsdrp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = gershtein_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = gvozdev_rsdrp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = shlyapnikov_nsp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = rykov_nsp_candidate
	
	clr_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_minister_eco = token:RUS_Mikhail_I_Tereshchenko_eco_sli }
	
	clr_country_flag = pletnyov_kdp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
	
	clr_country_flag = milyukov_kdp_candidate
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_minister_for = token:RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli }
	
	clr_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = VNS_oligarchic }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_hog = token:RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade }
		else = {
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_sec = token:RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_sec_ade }
		}
	}
		
	clr_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate	
	clr_country_flag = wrangel_vns_candidate
	clr_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
	clr_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
	clr_country_flag = ariadna_ep_candidate
	clr_country_flag = arkhangelsky_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = ivanov_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = likhach_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = vergun_nsnp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = trushnovich_nsnp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = georgievsky_nsnp_candidate
	clr_country_flag = odinets_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = odinets_nrpr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = pryanishnikov_nsnp_candidate
	
	clr_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_minister_for = token:RUS_Viktor_M_Chernov_for_sde }		
	
	clr_country_flag = gendelman_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
	clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = NSNP_candidate_exists
	clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
}
RUS_run_presidential_elections = {
	RUS_clear_president_election_variables = yes
	set_country_flag = RUS_presidential_general_elections
	set_variable = { RUS_rkp_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_ep_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_rovs_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_president_votes = 0 }
	set_variable = { RUS_independent_president_votes = 0 }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_total_president_votes = 0 }
	
	every_owned_state = {
		RUS_get_final_popularities = yes

		set_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = state_population_k }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vote_count_state = RUS_state_general_turnout }

		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_president_votes = RUS_state_plsr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_president_votes = RUS_state_nsp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_president_votes = RUS_state_psr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes = RUS_state_rsdrp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes = RUS_state_lkdp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes = RUS_state_rkdp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_president_votes = RUS_state_vns_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_ep_state_president_votes = RUS_state_ep_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes = RUS_state_nrpr_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes = RUS_state_nsnp_final_pop }
		set_variable = { RUS_independent_state_president_votes = RUS_state_independent_final_pop }

		multiply_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_psr_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_vns_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_ep_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }
		multiply_variable = { RUS_independent_state_president_votes = RUS_vote_count_state }

		round_variable = RUS_plsr_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_psr_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_vns_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_ep_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_independent_state_president_votes

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_plsr_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_nsp_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_psr_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_psr_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}	
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_vns_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_ep_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_ep_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}	
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}	
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_independent_state_president_votes < 0 }
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_independent_state_president_votes = 0 }
		}	
		
		set_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_plsr_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_nsp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_psr_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_vns_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_ep_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_total_state_president_votes = RUS_independent_state_president_votes }

		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_plsr_president_votes = RUS_plsr_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nsp_president_votes = RUS_nsp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_psr_president_votes = RUS_psr_state_president_votes }

		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_ep_president_votes = RUS_ep_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nrpr_president_votes = RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_nsnp_president_votes = RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes }
		add_to_variable = { PREV.RUS_independent_president_votes = RUS_independent_state_president_votes }

		set_variable = { RUS_state_rkp_temp_pop = 0 }

		log = "[THIS.GetName]: EP ([?RUS_ep_state_president_votes]) - NRPR ([?RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes]) - IND ([?RUS_independent_state_president_votes]) - TOTAL VOTES ([?RUS_total_state_president_votes])"
	}
	round_variable = RUS_plsr_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsp_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_psr_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_lkdp_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_rkdp_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_vns_president_votes

	round_variable = RUS_nrpr_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_nsnp_president_votes
	round_variable = RUS_independent_president_votes
	
	#Adjust for banned parties
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_nrpr_president_votes = 0 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_president_votes = 0 }
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_plsr_president_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nsp_president_votes = 0 }
	}

		limit = {

	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_president_votes = RUS_nsp_president_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_president_votes = RUS_psr_president_votes }

	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_president_votes = RUS_nsnp_president_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_total_president_votes = RUS_independent_president_votes }
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_total_president_votes }
	multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_temp_parliament_barrier = RUS_parliament_barrier }
	
	set_variable = { RUS_kdp_president_votes = RUS_lkdp_president_votes }
	add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_president_votes = RUS_rkdp_president_votes }

	set_variable = { RUS_nsp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_nsp_president_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote = RUS_psr_president_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_rsdrp_president_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_lkdp_president_votes }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_rkdp_president_votes }

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties
			}
			set_variable = { RUS_rrdo_percentage_president_vote = RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote }

			set_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_rkdp_percentage_president_vote }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_lkdp_percentage_president_vote }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote = RUS_rkdp_percentage_president_vote }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia

			add_to_variable = { RUS_rpr_percentage_president_vote = RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote }
		}
	
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rpr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rrdo_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rsdrp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_lkdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rkdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote }
		}

			check_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rrdo_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rpr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote > RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_president_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rsdrp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rrdo_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rpr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_ep_president_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rsdrp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_psr_kdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rrdo_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nrpr_president_victory
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nsp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rsdrp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_rrdo_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote }
			check_variable = { RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote > RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nsnp_president_victory
	}		
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_PLSR_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_NSP_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_RSDRP_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_PSR_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_LKDP_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_RKDP_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_VNS_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_EP_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_NRPR_CAMPAIGN
	clr_country_flag = RUS_1941_NSNP_CAMPAIGN
	round_variable = RUS_total_votes
	log = "[THIS.GetName]: PLSR([?plsr_total_percentage_vote]) - NSP([?nsp_total_percentage_vote]) - RSDRP([?rsdrp_total_percentage_vote]) - PSR([?psr_total_percentage_vote]) - KDP([?kdp_percentage_vote])"
	log = "VNS([?vns_total_percentage_vote]) - EP([?ep_total_percentage_vote]) - NRPR([?nrpr_total_percentage_vote]) - NSNP([?nsnp_total_percentage_vote]) - IND([?independent_total_percentage_vote])"
}


mp_support_calc = {
	# 0 for Inactive, 1 for Governing, 2 for Supporting Government, 3 for Opposition, 4 for Sit-out
	# NOTE: Because of how arrays start at zero, the ID's for each party here are one less than normal
	set_variable = { mp_support = 0 }
	if = {
		limit = { plsr_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 } # PLSR  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { nsp_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 1 } # NSP  (Governing)		
		}
	if = {
		limit = { psr_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 1 } # PSR  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { rsdrp_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 1 } # RSDRP  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				lkdp_in_power = yes 
				AND = {
					kdp_in_power = yes
					has_country_flag = kdp_united
			}
		}
	}
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 1 } # LKDP  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { pp_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^6 = 1 } # PP  (Governing)		
		}
	if = {
		limit = { rkdp_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 1 } # RKDP  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { vns_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^8 = 1 } # VNS  (Governing)		
			}
	if = {
		limit = { ep_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^9 = 1 } # EP  (Governing)		
		}
	if = {
		limit = { nsnp_in_power = yes }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^11 = 1 } # NSNP  (Governing)		
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 1 } # NRPR  (Governing)		
	}
	for_each_loop ={
		array = Duma_Party_Identity
		value = status
		index = i
		
		# Calculating total support
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
					check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 1 } 
					check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 2 } 
			}
		}
			add_to_variable = { mp_support = Duma_Party_Seats^i }
	}
		# Setting Opposition
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 1 } }
				NOT = {	check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 2 } }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
					check_variable = { Duma_Party_Identity^i < 13 }
			}
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 3 }
		}
	}
		# Setting Sit-out
	else = {
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 4 }
	}
		# Setting as non-existing if have no seats
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
					check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^i < 1 } 
					check_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^i < 1 }
				} 
			}
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 0 }
		}
	}
	}
senators_support_calc = {
	final_senators_recalc = yes	
	set_variable = { senate_support = 0 }
	for_each_loop ={
		array = Duma_Party_Identity
		value = status
		index = i
		
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
					check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 1 } 
					check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 2 } 
	}
	}
			add_to_variable = { senate_support = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^i }
			}
		}
	}
final_senators_recalc = {
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^1 } 
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^2 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^3 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^4 }
