	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^16 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^21 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^21 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^20 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^20 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^44 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^44}
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^22 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^22 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^23 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^23 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^24 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^24 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^25 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^25 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^26 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^26 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^27 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^27 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^28 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^28 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^29 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^29 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^30 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^30 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^32 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^32 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^33 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^33 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^34 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^34 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^35 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^35 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^36 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^36 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^37 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^37 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^38 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^38 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^39 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^39 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^40 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^40 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^41 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^41 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^42 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^42 }
	set_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^43 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^43 }

	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^1 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^2 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^3 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^4 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^5 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^6 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^6 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^7 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^8 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^9 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^17 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^17 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^19 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^19 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^18 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^18 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^13 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^13 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^14 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^14 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^15 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^15 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^10 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^10 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^31 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^31 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^16 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^21 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^21 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^20 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^20 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^44 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^44}
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^22 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^22 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^23 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^23 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^24 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^24 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^25 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^25 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^26 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^26 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^27 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^27 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^28 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^28 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^29 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^29 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^30 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^30 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^32 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^32 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^33 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^33 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^34 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^34 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^35 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^35 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^36 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^36 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^37 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^37 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^38 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^38 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^39 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^39 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^40 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^40 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^41 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^41 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^42 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^42 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^43 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^43 }
		
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^1 } 
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^2 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^5 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^6 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^6 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^7 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^8 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^9 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^12 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^11 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^16 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^13 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^13 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^14 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^14 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^15 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^15 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^17 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^17 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^19 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^19 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^18 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^18 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^10 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^10 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^31 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^31 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^21 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^21 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^20 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^20 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^44 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^44 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^22 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^22 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^23 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^23 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^24 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^24 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^25 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^25 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^26 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^26 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^27 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^27 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^28 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^28 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^29 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^29 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^30 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^30 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^32 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^32 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^33 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^33 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^34 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^34 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^35 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^35 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^36 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^36 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^37 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^37 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^38 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^38 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^39 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^39 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^40 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^40 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^41 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^41 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^42 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^42 }
	add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^43 = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^43 }
	
	set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Total_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i
		
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^i }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 550 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 553 }
	}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 3 }
}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 552 }
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 551 }
	}
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 549 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 548 }
	}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 547 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 546 }
	}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 4 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 545 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 544 }
	}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 6 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 543 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 7 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 542 }
	}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 8 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 541 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 9 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 540 }
	}
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 10 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 539 }

			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 = 11 }
		}

RUS_clear_president_election_variables = {
	clear_variable = RUS_plsr_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_nsp_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_psr_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_rsdrp_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_kdp_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_vns_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_ep_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_nrpr_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_nsnp_percentage_president_vote
	clear_variable = RUS_independent_percentage_president_vote
		
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_plsr_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nsp_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rsdrp_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rpr_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rrdo_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_lkdp_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rkdp_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_kdp_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_ep_president_victory
	clr_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nrpr_president_victory

		round_variable = RUS_nsp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_psr_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rsdrp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_lkdp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_rkdp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_vns_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_ep_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nrpr_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_nsnp_state_president_votes
		round_variable = RUS_independent_state_president_votes
		clear_variable = RUS_total_state_president_votes
		clear_variable = RUS_vote_state_president_votes
	}
}

RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop = {
	if = {
		limit = { plsr_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { nsp_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { psr_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { rsdrp_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { lkdp_in_power = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
			RUS_increase_kdp_pop = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_lkdp_pop = yes
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { pp_in_power = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
			RUS_increase_kdp_pop = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_pp_pop = yes
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { rkdp_in_power = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
			RUS_increase_kdp_pop = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_rkdp_pop = yes
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { vns_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_vns_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { ep_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_ep_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { nsnp_in_power = yes }
		RUS_increase_nsnp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
	}	
}
RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop = {
	if = {
		limit = { plsr_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { nsp_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { psr_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_psr_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { rsdrp_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { lkdp_in_power = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
			RUS_decrease_kdp_pop = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_decrease_lkdp_pop = yes
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { pp_in_power = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
			RUS_decrease_kdp_pop = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_decrease_pp_pop = yes
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { rkdp_in_power = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
			RUS_decrease_kdp_pop = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop = yes
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { vns_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_vns_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { ep_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_ep_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { nsnp_in_power = yes }
		RUS_decrease_nsnp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
		RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop = yes
	}	
}
RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_plsr_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = -0.1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = syndicalist
		popularity = -0.07
	}
}
RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_nsp_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = -0.1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = radical_socialist
		popularity = -0.07
	}
}
RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = -0.1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = social_democrat
		popularity = -0.035
	}
}
RUS_decrease_psr_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_psr_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = -0.1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = social_democrat
		popularity = -0.035
	}
}
RUS_decrease_kdp_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_kdp_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = -0.035 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = -0.035 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = -0.035 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = social_liberal
		popularity = -0.035
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = market_liberal
		popularity = -0.035
	}
}

RUS_decrease_vtssps_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_vtssps_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
				check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 4 }
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_temp_pop = -0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
}
RUS_decrease_vks_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_vks_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_state_category = zero
					has_state_category = one
					has_state_category = two
					has_state_category = three
					has_state_category = four
					has_state_category = five
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_temp_pop = -0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
}
RUS_decrease_bund_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_bund_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 4 }
					has_state_category = six
					has_state_category = seven
					has_state_category = eight
					has_state_category = nine
					has_state_category = ten
					has_state_category = eleven
					has_state_category = twelve
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						state = 1194				
						state = 1195			
						state = 1196			
						state = 1197			
						state = 1198			
						state = 1199			
						state = 651			
						state = 249	
						is_core_of = MTR
						is_core_of = ALO
						is_core_of = TRK
						is_core_of = UZB
						is_core_of = KYR
						is_core_of = AZE
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_temp_pop = -0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
}
RUS_decrease_paole_zion_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_paole_zion_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 4 }
					has_state_category = six
					has_state_category = seven
					has_state_category = eight
					has_state_category = nine
					has_state_category = ten
					has_state_category = eleven
					has_state_category = twelve
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						state = 1194				
						state = 1195			
						state = 1196			
						state = 1197			
						state = 1198			
						state = 1199			
						state = 651			
						state = 249	
						is_core_of = MTR
						is_core_of = ALO
						is_core_of = TRK
						is_core_of = UZB
						is_core_of = KYR
						is_core_of = AZE
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_temp_pop = -0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = 0.01 }
		}
	}
}

			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = -0.01 }

RUS_increase_kdp_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_kdp_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = 0.035 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = 0.035 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = 0.035 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = -0.01 }
		}
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = social_liberal
		popularity = 0.035
	}
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = market_liberal
		popularity = 0.035
	}
}

RUS_increase_vtssps_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_vtssps_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
				check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 4 }
			}			
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vtssps_temp_pop = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = -0.01 }
		}
	}
}
RUS_increase_vks_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_vks_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_state_category = zero
					has_state_category = one
					has_state_category = two
					has_state_category = three
					has_state_category = four
					has_state_category = five
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_temp_pop = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = -0.01 }
		}
	}
}
RUS_increase_bund_pop = {
	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_bund_pop_tt
	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 4 }
					has_state_category = six
					has_state_category = seven
					has_state_category = eight
					has_state_category = nine
					has_state_category = ten
					has_state_category = eleven
					has_state_category = twelve
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						state = 1194				
						state = 1195			
						state = 1196			
						state = 1197			
						state = 1198			
						state = 1199			
						state = 651			
						state = 249	
						is_core_of = MTR
						is_core_of = ALO
						is_core_of = TRK
						is_core_of = UZB
						is_core_of = KYR
						is_core_of = AZE
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_bund_temp_pop = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = -0.01 }
		}
	}
}

	hidden_effect = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { industrial_popularity = THIS.num_of_factories }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { industrial_popularity > 4 }
					has_state_category = six
					has_state_category = seven
					has_state_category = eight
					has_state_category = nine
					has_state_category = ten
					has_state_category = eleven
					has_state_category = twelve
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						state = 1194				
						state = 1195			
						state = 1196			
						state = 1197			
						state = 1198			
						state = 1199			
						state = 651			
						state = 249	
						is_core_of = MTR
						is_core_of = ALO
						is_core_of = TRK
						is_core_of = UZB
						is_core_of = KYR
						is_core_of = AZE
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_paole_zion_temp_pop = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rsdrp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vns_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_ep_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_temp_pop = -0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_independent_temp_pop = -0.01 }

RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = {
	# Generate partial sums t1 = (P1), t2 = (P1 + P2), t3 = (P1 + P2 + P3)
	
	# so that we can use resize_array to fill our array with the right number of seats for each party
	set_temp_variable = { t1 = 0 }
	set_temp_variable = { t2 = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
	set_temp_variable = { t3 = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
	set_temp_variable = { t4 = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
	set_temp_variable = { t5 = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	set_temp_variable = { t6 = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }

	set_temp_variable = { t22 = Duma_Party_Seats^21 }

	set_temp_variable = { t27 = Duma_Party_Seats^25 }
	set_temp_variable = { t28 = Duma_Party_Seats^26 }

	set_temp_variable = { t30 = Duma_Party_Seats^28 }
	set_temp_variable = { t31 = Duma_Party_Seats^29 }

	resize_array = { array = RUS_Lower_House_Display value = 40 size = t40 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Lower_House_Display value = 41 size = t41 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Lower_House_Display value = 42 size = t42 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Lower_House_Display value = 43 size = t43 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Lower_House_Display value = 44 size = t44 }
	# Resize array to all 550 seats
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Lower_House_Display value = 45 size = t45 }
	
	log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: DUMA ARRAY LENGHT [?RUS_Lower_House_Display^num]"
}
RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = {
	# Generate partial sums t1 = (P1), t2 = (P1 + P2), t3 = (P1 + P2 + P3)
	
	# so that we can use resize_array to fill our array with the right number of seats for each party
	set_temp_variable = { t1 = 0 }
	set_temp_variable = { t2 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
	set_temp_variable = { t3 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
	set_temp_variable = { t4 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
	set_temp_variable = { t5 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
	set_temp_variable = { t6 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
	set_temp_variable = { t7 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^6 }
	set_temp_variable = { t8 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
	set_temp_variable = { t9 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 }
	set_temp_variable = { t10 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
	set_temp_variable = { t11 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^10 }
	set_temp_variable = { t12 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^11 }
	set_temp_variable = { t13 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
	set_temp_variable = { t14 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^13 }
	set_temp_variable = { t15 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^14 }
	set_temp_variable = { t16 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^15 }
	set_temp_variable = { t17 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
	set_temp_variable = { t18 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^17 }
	set_temp_variable = { t19 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^18 }
	set_temp_variable = { t20 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^19 }
	set_temp_variable = { t21 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^20 }
	set_temp_variable = { t22 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^21 }
	set_temp_variable = { t23 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^44 }
	set_temp_variable = { t24 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^22 }
	set_temp_variable = { t25 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^23 }
	set_temp_variable = { t26 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^24 }
	set_temp_variable = { t27 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^25 }
	set_temp_variable = { t28 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^26 }
	set_temp_variable = { t29 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^27 }
	set_temp_variable = { t30 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^28 }
	set_temp_variable = { t31 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^29 }
	set_temp_variable = { t32 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^30 }
	set_temp_variable = { t33 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^31 }
	set_temp_variable = { t34 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^32 }
	set_temp_variable = { t35 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^33 }
	set_temp_variable = { t36 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^34 }
	set_temp_variable = { t37 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^35 }
	set_temp_variable = { t38 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^36 }
	set_temp_variable = { t39 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^37 }
	set_temp_variable = { t40 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^38 }
	set_temp_variable = { t41 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^39 }
	set_temp_variable = { t42 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^40 }
	set_temp_variable = { t43 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^41 }
	set_temp_variable = { t44 = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^42 }
	set_temp_variable = { t45 = 150 }

	add_to_temp_variable = { t1 = t0 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t2 = t1 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t3 = t2 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t4 = t3 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t5 = t4 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t6 = t5 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t7 = t6 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t8 = t7 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t9 = t8 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t10 = t9 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t11 = t10 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t12 = t11 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t13 = t12 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t14 = t13 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t15 = t14 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t16 = t15 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t17 = t16 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t18 = t17 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t19 = t18 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t20 = t19 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t21 = t20 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t22 = t21 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t23 = t22 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t24 = t23 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t25 = t24 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t26 = t25 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t27 = t26 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t28 = t27 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t29 = t28 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t30 = t29 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t31 = t30 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t32 = t31 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t33 = t32 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t34 = t33 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t35 = t34 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t36 = t35 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t37 = t36 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t38 = t37 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t39 = t38 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t40 = t39 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t41 = t40 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t42 = t41 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t43 = t42 }
	add_to_temp_variable = { t44 = t43 }
	
	clear_array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display
	
	# Resize array to t1 seats, setting P1 frame numbers to 1 (Party 1 color)
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 1 size = t1 }
	# Resize array to t2 seats, setting P2 frame numbers to 2 (Party 2 color)
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 2 size = t2 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 3 size = t3 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 4 size = t4 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 5 size = t5 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 6 size = t6 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 7 size = t7 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 8 size = t8 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 9 size = t9 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 10 size = t10 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 11 size = t11 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 12 size = t12 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 13 size = t13 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 14 size = t14 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 15 size = t15 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 16 size = t16 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 17 size = t17 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 18 size = t18 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 19 size = t19 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 20 size = t20 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 21 size = t21 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 22 size = t22 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 23 size = t23 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 24 size = t24 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 25 size = t25 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 26 size = t26 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 27 size = t27 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 28 size = t28 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 29 size = t29 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 30 size = t30 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 31 size = t31 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 32 size = t32 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 33 size = t33 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 34 size = t34 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 35 size = t35 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 36 size = t36 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 37 size = t37 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 38 size = t38 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 39 size = t39 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 40 size = t40 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 41 size = t41 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 42 size = t42 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 43 size = t43 }
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 44 size = t44 }
	# Resize array to all 550 seats, setting remaining frame numbers to 11 (Party 11 color)
	resize_array = { array = RUS_Senate_Election_Display value = 45 size = t45 }
	
	log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: SENATE ARRAY LENGHT [?RUS_Senate_Election_Display^num]"
	set_variable = { three_fifth_of_senate = 90 }
}

predetermine_all_presidential_candidates = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = NSP_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {	
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = EP_candidate_existed
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
		}
		set_country_flag = NSP_candidate_existed
	}
}
restore_all_presidential_candidates = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {	
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = EP_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_existed
		}
		set_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
	}
}

determine_second_tour_candidates = {
	#predetermine all who participants
	predetermine_all_presidential_candidates = yes
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
				check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
