				check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			}
			clr_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			clr_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
		}
	}
}
	
count_second_tour_candidates = {
	set_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = 0 }
	set_variable = { votes_for_vns_candidate = 0 }
		
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
							has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
						}
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
							has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
						}
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
							has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
						}
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
							has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
						}
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
							has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition
							has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
							has_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
							has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
						}
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
							has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
						}
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
			}
		}
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
		}	
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
						has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = Conservative_candidate_exists
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^8 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
					has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^9 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = NSP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
						has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
							OR = {
								has_country_flag = teslenko_kdp_candidate
								has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
		}
	}
	
	
			
	
	### Independent Candidates Vote For Ruling###
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			psr_in_power = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = maklakov_psr_kdp_candidate
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			rsdrp_in_power = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_liberal
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition
				NOT = { has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate }
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_government = social_conservative
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_government = authoritarian_democrat
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
			}
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		add_to_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^16 }
	}
	
}	
RUS_determine_president_winner = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_conservative_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_Conservative_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_liberal_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_Liberal_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_lkdp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_LKDP_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rkdp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_RKDP_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nsp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_NSP_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_plsr_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_PLSR_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_psr_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_PSR_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_rsdrp_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_RSDRP_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_socialist_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_Socialist_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_ep_candidate > votes_for_nrpr_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_EP_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_conservative_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_liberal_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_lkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_rkdp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_nsp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_plsr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_psr_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_rsdrp_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_ep_candidate }
			check_variable = { votes_for_nrpr_candidate > votes_for_socialist_candidate }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_Candidate_Winner
	}
}
setup_presidential_government_senate = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Dmitriy Romanov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible }
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			RUS_Mikhail_A_Taube_for_ade
			RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco
			RUS_Pyotr_Kazanskiy_sec_sco
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Felix Yusupov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible }
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco
			RUS_Mikhail_A_Taube_for_ade
			RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco
			RUS_Pyotr_Kazanskiy_sec_sco
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Pyotr Savitskiy"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Georgiy Vernadskiy"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}	
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible }
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Nikolay_S_Trubetskoy_hog_sco
			RUS_Pavel_Florenskiy_for_sco
			RUS_Konstantin_A_Chkheidze_eco_ade
			RUS_Pyetr_N_Savitskiy_sec_ade
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Nikolay Teslenko"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible }
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli
			RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
			RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
			RUS_Vasiliy_A_Kharlamov_sec_mli
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Mikhail Tereschenko"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible }
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_hog_sli
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
			RUS_Mikhail_V_Bernacki_eco_mli
			RUS_Nikolay_Gredeskul_sec_sco
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Vasiliy Maklakov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible }
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli
			RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
			RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
			RUS_Vasiliy_A_Kharlamov_sec_mli
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
}
setup_ruling_party_president = {
	clr_country_flag = RUS_Conservative_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_Liberal_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_LKDP_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_RKDP_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_PLSR_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_NSP_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_RSDRP_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_PSR_Candidate_Winner
	clr_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_Candidate_Winner
	restore_all_presidential_candidates = yes
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_Socialist_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			psr_in_power = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = maklakov_psr_kdp_candidate
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_Liberal_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_PSR_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_Socialist_Candidate_Winner
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			rsdrp_in_power = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_RSDRP_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_Socialist_Candidate_Winner
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_liberal
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_LKDP_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_RKDP_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_kdp_vns_coalition
				NOT = { has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_Conservative_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_Liberal_Candidate_Winner
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_government = social_conservative
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_Conservative_Candidate_Winner
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_government = authoritarian_democrat
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_EP_Candidate_Winner
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_Conservative_Candidate_Winner
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_Candidate_Winner
	}
	setup_new_president = yes
}
setup_new_president = {
	hidden_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_Conservative_Candidate_Winner
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate		
				}
				RUS_setup_president_vernadskiy = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate		
				}
				RUS_setup_president_savitskiy = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_kdp_candidate
						has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
					}
				}
				RUS_setup_president_yusupov = yes
			}
			else = {
				RUS_setup_president_romanov = yes
			}			
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_Liberal_Candidate_Winner
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = maklakov_psr_kdp_candidate
						has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
					}
				}
				RUS_setup_president_maklakov = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = teslenko_kdp_candidate
						has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate
					}		
				}
				RUS_setup_president_teslenko = yes
			}
			else = {
				RUS_setup_president_tereschenko = yes
			}			
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_Candidate_Winner
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gershtein_psr_candidate
				}
				RUS_setup_president_gershtein = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate	
						has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_kdp_candidate
					}
				}
				RUS_setup_president_avksentiev = yes
			}
			else = {
				RUS_setup_president_chernov = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_RSDRP_Candidate_Winner
			}
			RUS_setup_president_lozovskiy = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_Socialist_Candidate_Winner
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gershtein_psr_candidate
				}
				RUS_setup_president_gershtein = yes
			}
			else = {
				RUS_setup_president_lozovskiy = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_Candidate_Winner
			}
			RUS_setup_president_odinets = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_RSDRP_REFORM_accepted }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted }
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		}
	}
}
remove_add_presidential_senators = {
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats
		value = seats
		index = i
		
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^i = 0 }
	}		
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_vns_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^8 = 40 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^9 = 5 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^7 = 5 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_ep_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^9 = 50 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_a_rkdp_president = yes
				has_a_pp_president = yes
				has_a_lkdp_president = yes
			}
			has_country_flag = kdp_united
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^5 = 50 }		
	}
	else = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			has_a_rkdp_president = yes
		}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^7 = 50 }		
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_a_pp_president = yes
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^6 = 50 }		
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_lkdp_president = yes
		}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^5 = 50 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_psr_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 30 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^18 = 20 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_rsdrp_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 = 40 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^2 = 5 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^1 = 5 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 = 10 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Lev Gershtein"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 20 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^18 = 15 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 = 5 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^2 = 5 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^1 = 5 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 15 }
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 = 15 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^17 = 15 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 5 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^2 = 5 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^1 = 5 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_nrpr_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^12 = 50 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_nsnp_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^11 = 50 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_nsp_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^2 = 50 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_plsr_president = yes
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^1 = 50 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Pitirim Sorokin"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition }
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^8 = 20 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^16 = 20 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^5 = 15 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 = 10 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_I_Was_Never_A_Socialist
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^5 = 40 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_I_Was_Never_A_Liberal
			}
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^4 = 20 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^3 = 30 }
		}		
	}
	
	final_senators_recalc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
	RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
}
RUS_setup_initial_minister_tokens = {
	# PLSR #
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_minister_hog = token:RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_minister_for = token:RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_minister_eco = token:RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn }
	set_variable = { RUS_plsr_minister_sec = token:RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn }

	# LKDP #

	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_minister_for = token:RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_minister_eco = token:RUS_Mikhail_I_Tereshchenko_eco_sli }
	set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_minister_sec = token:RUS_Nikolay_Gredeskul_sec_sco }
	# PP #
	set_variable = { RUS_pp_minister_hog = token:RUS_Aleksandr_I_Konovalov_hog_mli }
	# RKDP #
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_minister_hog = token:RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_minister_eco = token:RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_minister_sec = token:RUS_Vasiliy_A_Kharlamov_sec_mli }
	# VNS #
	set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_hog = token:RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_minister_hog = token:RUS_Mikhail_A_Taube_for_ade }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_minister_eco = token:RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco }
	set_variable = { RUS_rkdp_minister_sec = token:RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_sec_ade }
	
}
RUS_setup_plsr_government = {
	add_ideas = var:RUS_plsr_minister_hog
	add_ideas = var:RUS_plsr_minister_for
	add_ideas = var:RUS_plsr_minister_eco
	add_ideas = var:RUS_plsr_minister_sec
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = syndicalist
		popularity = 0.05
	}
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 }
	if = {
		limit = { 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name }
		}
		set_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition
		}
		RUS_rsdrp_supports_gov = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_id = 21 }
		RUS_organisation_supports_gov = yes
	}
	mp_support_calc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
}
RUS_setup_nsp_government = {
	add_ideas = var:RUS_nsp_minister_hog
	add_ideas = var:RUS_nsp_minister_for
	add_ideas = var:RUS_nsp_minister_eco
	add_ideas = var:RUS_nsp_minister_sec
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = radical_socialist
		popularity = 0.05
	}
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 1 }
	if = {
		limit = { 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Coalition_Only_In_Name }

		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes
	}

			has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition

RUS_setup_rsdrp_government = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_rsrpi_exists
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_rsrpi_party
			long_name = RUS_rsrpi_party_long
		}
	}
	else = {
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mensheviks_party
			long_name = RUS_mensheviks_party_long
		}
	}
	add_ideas = var:RUS_rsdrp_minister_hog
	add_ideas = var:RUS_rsdrp_minister_for
	add_ideas = var:RUS_rsdrp_minister_eco
	add_ideas = var:RUS_rsdrp_minister_sec
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = social_democrat
		popularity = 0.025
	}
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 1 }
	set_temp_variable = { party_id = 21 }
	RUS_organisation_supports_gov = yes		
	if = {
		limit = { 
			has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition
		}
		RUS_plsr_support_gov = yes
		RUS_nsp_support_gov = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
		}
		RUS_psr_support_gov = yes
	}
	mp_support_calc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
}
RUS_setup_psr_government = {
	add_ideas = var:RUS_psr_minister_hog
	add_ideas = var:RUS_psr_minister_for
	add_ideas = var:RUS_psr_minister_eco
	add_ideas = var:RUS_psr_minister_sec
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_socdems_rpr }
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_rpr_party
			long_name = RUS_rpr_party_long
		}
	}
	else = { 
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_rev_party
			long_name = RUS_social_rev_party_long
		}		
	}	
	add_popularity = {
		ideology = social_democrat
		popularity = 0.025
	}
	set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 1 }
	set_temp_variable = { party_id = 18 }
	RUS_organisation_supports_gov = yes		
	if = {
		limit = { 
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
		}
		RUS_rsdrp_supports_gov = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
		}
		RUS_lkdp_supports_gov = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Republican_Party_Of_Russia }
		set_country_flag = national_populist_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Unite_The_Parties }
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	mp_support_calc = yes
	senators_support_calc = yes
}

clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = {
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Seats
		value = support
		index = i
		
		set_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i = 0 }
	}
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Total_Seats
		value = support
		index = i
		
		set_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i = 0 }
	}

RUS_LAW_calculate_support = {
	# Opposition votes AGAINST despite all
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Status
		value = status
		index = i
		
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^i = 3 } }
			set_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^i = 0 }
			set_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^i = 0 }
		}
	}
	
	
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Seats
		value = support
		index = i
		
		set_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i = Duma_Party_Seats^i }
		multiply_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i = CurrentSupportForBillPerc^i }
		round_variable = CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i
		add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSupport = CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i }
	}	
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Total_Seats
		value = support
		index = i
		
		set_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^i }
		multiply_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i = CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^i }
		round_variable = CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i
		add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSenateSupport = CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i }
	}		
	
	# set_variable = { CurrentPLSRSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^1 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentNSPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^2 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentPSRSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentRSDRPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^4 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentLKDPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentPPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^6 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentRKDPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^7 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentVNSSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^8 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentEPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^9 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentNRPRSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentNSNPSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentvtsspsSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^17 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentmskSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^19 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentvksSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^18 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentoblastnikiSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^13 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentautonomistsSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^14 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentfederalistsSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^15 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentIndependentSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^16 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentmonarchistsSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^10 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentcossacksSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^31 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentbundSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^21 }
	# set_variable = { Currentpaole_zionSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^20 }
	# set_variable = { Currentbaltic_socialistsSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^44 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentbpsrSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^22 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentbsrhSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^23 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentbsdpSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^24 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentbnaSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^25 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentbspzdSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^26 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentukpSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^27 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentupsrSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^28 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentusdrpSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^29 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentuvoSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^30 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentyuskvetSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^32 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentssdpSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^33 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentsogskSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^34 }
	# set_variable = { CurrenthunchakSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^35 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentdashnakSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^36 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentramgavarSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^37 }
	# set_variable = { CurrenthummetSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^38 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentmusavatSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^39 }
	# set_variable = { CurrenterkSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^40 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentalashSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^41 }
	# set_variable = { Currentmilliy_ittihodSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^42 }
	# set_variable = { Currentyoung_turkestanSupportForBill = Duma_Party_Seats^43 }
	
	# set_variable = { CurrentPLSRSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^1 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentNSPSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^2 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentPSRSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^3 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentRSDRPSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^4 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentLKDPSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentPPSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^6 }
	# set_variable = { CurrentRKDPSenateSupportForBill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^7 }

	# add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSupport = CurrentalashSenateSupportForBill }
	# add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSupport = Currentmilliy_ittihodSenateSupportForBill }
	# add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSupport = Currentyoung_turkestanSenateSupportForBill }
}
Get_initial_RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT = {
	clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = yes
	
	# Initial Support #
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_vns_president = yes
			OR = { 
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.15 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^3 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0.7 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.25 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_ep_president = yes
			OR = { 
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0.75 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 0.8 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.25 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^3 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0.7 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 0.75 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.25 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_lkdp_president = yes
			OR = { 
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^9 = 0.8 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.25 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^3 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^9 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.85 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
			has_a_rkdp_president = yes
				has_a_pp_president = yes
			}
			OR = { 
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^9 = 0.8 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.22 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^3 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^9 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0.85 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_a_nsnp_president = yes
			OR = { 
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^3 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^4 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0.85 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_a_psr_president = yes
				has_a_rsdrp_president = yes
			}
			OR = { 
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^7 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^8 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^9 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^7 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^8 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^9 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 1 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_a_plsr_president = yes
				has_a_nsp_president = yes
				has_a_socialist_president = yes
			}
			OR = { 
				has_government = social_liberal
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^5 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^7 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^8 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^9 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^5 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^7 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^8 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^9 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 1 }
	}
	else = {
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^2 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^7 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^8 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^9 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^12 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^3 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^4 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^5 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^7 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^8 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^9 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^12 = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^11 = 0 }
	}
	set_temp_variable = { CurrentSupportForBillPerc^16 = 0 }
	set_temp_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^16 = 0 }
	
	RUS_LAW_calculate_support = yes
	count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes 
}
randomize_plsr_support_very_low = {
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0 max = 0.2 }
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0 max = 0.2 }	
}
randomize_plsr_support_low = {
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0.2 max = 0.5 }
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0.2 max = 0.5 }	
}
randomize_plsr_support_average = {
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0.5 max = 0.7 }
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0.5 max = 0.7 }	
}
randomize_plsr_support_high = {
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0.7 max = 1 }
	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^1 min = 0.7 max = 1 }	
}

	set_temp_variable_to_random = { var = CurrentSenateSupportForBillPerc^2 min = 0 max = 0.2 }

Get_initial_RUS_nsp_law = {
	clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = yes
	
	randomize_plsr_support_low = yes
	randomize_nsp_support_high = yes
	randomize_psr_support_average = yes
	randomize_rsdrp_support_average = yes
	randomize_lkdp_support_very_low = yes
	randomize_independent_support_very_low = yes
	
	RUS_LAW_calculate_support = yes
	count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes
}

Get_initial_RUS_LAW_PSR_NEW_CONST = {
	clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = yes
	
	if = {
		limit = { 
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Reassure_Unity_With_NRPR
		}
		# Initial Support #
		randomize_psr_support_average = yes
		randomize_ep_support_very_low = yes
		randomize_nrpr_support_high = yes
		randomize_independent_support_low = yes
	}
	else = {
		# Initial Support #
		randomize_plsr_support_very_low = yes
		randomize_nsp_support_low = yes
		randomize_psr_support_high = yes
		randomize_rsdrp_support_average = yes
		randomize_lkdp_support_high = yes
		randomize_nsnp_support_very_low = yes
		randomize_independent_support_low = yes
}
	
	RUS_LAW_calculate_support = yes
	count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes
}
Get_initial_RUS_LAW_AGRICULTURAL_COMMITTEE = {
	clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = yes
	
	# Initial Support #
	randomize_plsr_support_average = yes
	randomize_psr_support_average = yes
	randomize_rsdrp_support_very_low = yes
	randomize_nrpr_support_average = yes
	randomize_independent_support_average = yes

	count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes
}
Get_initial_RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM = {
	clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = yes
	
	# Initial Support #
	randomize_plsr_support_low = yes
	randomize_nsp_support_low = yes
	randomize_psr_support_high = yes
	randomize_rsdrp_support_average = yes
	randomize_lkdp_support_high = yes
	randomize_nrpr_support_low = yes
	randomize_independent_support_high = yes
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_OPPOSITION_VOTES
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentPLSRSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentNSPSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentPSRSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentRSDRPSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentLKDPSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentPLSRSenateSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentNSPSenateSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentPSRSenateSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentRSDRPSenateSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentLKDPSenateSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
	}
	
	RUS_LAW_calculate_support = yes
	count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes
}

Get_initial_RUS_LAW_MERGE_PM_PRESIDENT = {
	clear_previous_variables_for_legislation = yes
	
	# Initial Support #
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Left_Radicals_Join_Vozhd
		}
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentPLSRSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { CurrentPLSRSenateSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_SR_Join_Our_Side
		}
		randomize_psr_support_average = yes
	}
	else = {
		randomize_psr_support_very_low = yes
	}
	randomize_ep_support_average = yes
	set_temp_variable = { CurrentNRPRSupportForBillPerc = 1 }
	
	RUS_LAW_calculate_support = yes

	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Dmitriy Odinets"
			}
		}
			}
	else = {
		set_variable = { CurrentPresidentSupportProbability = 85 }
		set_variable = { CurrentPresidentSupportUnprobability = 15 }
	}
	count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes
}
count_votes_for_bill_sum = {
	set_variable = { CurrentOverallSupport = 0 }
	set_variable = { CurrentOverallSenateSupport = 0 }
	
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Duma_Party_Seats
		value = votes
		index = i
		
		clamp_variable = { var = CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i min = 0 max = Duma_Party_Seats^i }
		add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSupport = CurrentDumaSupportForBill^i }
	}
	for_each_loop = {
		array = Senate_Party_Total_Seats
		value = votes
		index = i
		
		clamp_variable = { var = CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i min = 0 max = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^i }
		add_to_variable = { CurrentOverallSenateSupport = CurrentSenateSupportForBill^i }
	}
	round_variable = CurrentOverallSupport
	round_variable = CurrentOverallSenateSupport 
	
}
RUS_pass_current_law = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_MERGE_PM_PRESIDENT
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_MERGE_PM_PRESIDENT
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_MERGE_PM_PRESIDENT_accepted
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.372
			days = 3
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NEP
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NEP
		set_country_flag = nep_accepted
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.307
			days = 2
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONALIZATION_TRADE_UNIONS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONALIZATION_TRADE_UNIONS
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONALIZATION_TRADE_UNIONS_accepted
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		SOV_increase_tomsky = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_free_trade_unions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_free_trade_unions
				add_idea = trade_unions_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = banned_trade_unions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = banned_trade_unions
				add_idea = trade_unions_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_non_socialist_trade_unions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_non_socialist_trade_unions
				add_idea = trade_unions_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_trade_unions_impartiality }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_trade_unions_impartiality
				add_idea = trade_unions_3
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = trade_unions_3
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_PRESIDENT_WILL_BE_IMPEACHED
		country_event = rusdem.107
	}
	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PSR_SOCIALIZATION_OF_LAND
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PSR_SOCIALIZATION_OF_LAND
		set_country_flag = soc_land_accepted
		country_event = rusdem.416
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_TU_IMPARTIALITY
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_TU_IMPARTIALITY
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_TU_IMPARTIALITY_accepted
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = banned_trade_unions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = banned_trade_unions
				add_idea = RUS_trade_unions_impartiality
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_non_socialist_trade_unions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_non_socialist_trade_unions
				add_idea = RUS_trade_unions_impartiality
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_free_trade_unions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_free_trade_unions
				add_idea = RUS_trade_unions_impartiality
			}
		}
		else = {
		add_ideas = RUS_trade_unions_impartiality
	}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SOCIAL_WELFARE
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SOCIAL_WELFARE
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SOCIAL_WELFARE_accepted
		add_ideas = RUS_cheap_housing
		add_ideas = social_security
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 25
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_STATE_REGULATION
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_STATE_REGULATION
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_STATE_REGULATION_accepted
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_industrial_zones
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_industrial_zones
				add_idea = RUS_state_regulation
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FAIR_LABOUR_ACT
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FAIR_LABOUR_ACT
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FAIR_LABOUR_ACT_accepted
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_security
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = social_security
				add_idea = RUS_fair_labour
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_fair_labour
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PSR_NEW_CONST
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PSR_NEW_CONST
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PSR_NEW_CONST_accepted
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = 100
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.12
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Reassure_Unity_With_NRPR
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = national_populist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "The government will now have more power"
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_INDUSTRIAL_ZONES
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_INDUSTRIAL_ZONES
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_INDUSTRIAL_ZONES_accepted
		add_ideas = RUS_industrial_zones
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_LAW_INDUSTRIAL_ZONES_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { region = 14 }
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LAND_QUOTAS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LAND_QUOTAS
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LAND_QUOTAS_accepted
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_The_Land_Quotas_Bill }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LOCAL_PARLIAMENTS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LOCAL_PARLIAMENTS
		set_country_flag = loc_parl_accepted
		RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop = yes
		add_ideas = local_parliaments
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONAL_AGRARIAN_FUND
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONAL_AGRARIAN_FUND
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONAL_AGRARIAN_FUND_accepted
		RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop = yes
		destroy_unfinished_land_reform = yes
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = 250 decision = RUS_Mechanize_Agriculture_In_State } #Simbirsk
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = 257 decision = RUS_Mechanize_Agriculture_In_State } #Simbirsk
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = 254 decision = RUS_Mechanize_Agriculture_In_State } #Simbirsk

		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
			RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes			
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.25
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM
		RUS_decrease_psr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_lkdp_pop = yes
		add_stability = 0.07
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT
		RUS_decrease_pp_pop = yes
		add_stability = 0.07
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LIBERAL_TAX
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LIBERAL_TAX
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_LIBERAL_TAX_blocked
		RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_pp_pop = yes
		add_stability = -0.07
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PROGRESSIVE_TAX
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PROGRESSIVE_TAX
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PROGRESSIVE_TAX_blocked
		RUS_decrease_lkdp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_psr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = yes
		add_stability = -0.07
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SEMASHKO_SYSTEM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SEMASHKO_SYSTEM
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_CHEAP_HOUSING
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_GENERAL_EDUCATION
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_JEWISH_AUTONOMY
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_CHEAP_HOUSING
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_GENERAL_EDUCATION
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_JEWISH_AUTONOMY }
			RUS_decrease_paole_zion_pop = yes
			RUS_decrease_bund_pop = yes
			clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_JEWISH_AUTONOMY
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FEDERAL_COUNCILS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FEDERAL_COUNCILS
		add_stability = -0.06
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_MUNICIPAL_COUNCILS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_MUNICIPAL_COUNCILS
		set_country_flag = municipal_councils_blocked
		add_stability = -0.03
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_AGR_SEC_AGENCY
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_AGR_SEC_AGENCY
		add_stability = -0.04
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_UNIVERSAL_VOTING_SENATE
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_UNIVERSAL_VOTING_SENATE
		set_country_flag = RUS_UNIVERSAL_VOTING_SENATE_blocked
		add_stability = -0.08
		RUS_decrease_lkdp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_HOLD_THE_MONARCHY_REFERENDUM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_HOLD_THE_MONARCHY_REFERENDUM
		if = {
			limit = { #Tweak for dumb AI
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = monarchy_referendum_accepted
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_OPPOSITION_VOTES
				}
				country_event = rusdem.2090
			}
			country_event = rusdem.552
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.554
				days = 1
			}
			add_stability = 0.04
			RUS_increase_vns_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rkdp_pop = yes
			set_variable = { RUS_state_monarchy_referendum_turnout = 0.37 }
			set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_popular_support = popular_support }
			set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_popular_support_bonus = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_candidate_legitimacy = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_referendum_legitimacy = popular_support }
			set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_referendum_legitimacy_bonus = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_days_till_referendum = 90 }
			RUS_calculate_expected_monarchy_referendum = yes
			activate_mission = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum_deadline
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = monarchy_referendum_blocked
			country_event = rusdem.553
			add_stability = -0.15
			RUS_decrease_vns_pop = yes
			RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop = yes
		}
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FULL_LAND_PRIVATISATION
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_FULL_LAND_PRIVATISATION
		country_event = rus_kdp.14
		add_stability = -0.07
		RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_pp_pop = yes
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_DESTROY_LOCAL_PARLIAMENTS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_DESTROY_LOCAL_PARLIAMENTS
		add_stability = 0.07
		RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_pp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_JUDICIAL_REFORM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_JUDICIAL_REFORM
		add_stability = -0.07
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_AGRICULTURAL_ADJUSTMENT
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_AGRICULTURAL_ADJUSTMENT
		add_stability = -0.12
		RUS_decrease_lkdp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONAL_CULTURAL_AUTONOMIES
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_NATIONAL_CULTURAL_AUTONOMIES
		add_stability = -0.12
		RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_pp_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PROTECTIONISM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PROTECTIONISM
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PROTECTIONISM_blocked
		RUS_decrease_vns_pop = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRIVATIZE_RAILROAD
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRIVATIZE_RAILROAD
		set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRIVATIZE_RAILROAD_blocked
		add_stability = -0.05
		RUS_decrease_vns_pop = yes
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_TRADITIONAL_VALUES
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_TRADITIONAL_VALUES
		add_stability = -0.05
		RUS_decrease_vns_pop = yes
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_STOLYPIN_REFORMS
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_STOLYPIN_REFORMS
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_decrease_vns_pop = yes
	}	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PERESTROIKA
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PERESTROIKA
		add_stability = -0.15
		RUS_decrease_nsnp_pop = yes
	}
	clear_law_country_flag = yes	
}
